124a2('dul ba): ri yi bdag po lhun po rab brtan ltar/ /khyod kyi thugs ni rtag tu dge ba nyid/ /thub pa skyes mchog khams rnams thams cad nas/ /khyod kyi ye shes yangs pa sgrib mi mnga'/ skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ni/ /ma thogs
124a3('dul ba): nyams shing zad pa med par 'jug / thub pa khyod la gang la 'ang som nyi med/ /yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod ma yin/ /khyod nyid kyis ni mchog dang mchog min pa/ /rig pas thugs su chud nas thams cad mkhyen/ /mthong na dga' bar
124a4('dul ba): 'gyur la mthong na legs/ /mthong na legs pas mthong na mkhas pa dga'/ /khyod la dga' dang mi dga' mnyam pas na/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i spyod lam de bzhin mdzad/ /khyod ni snyan pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags/ 'dzum pa'i gsung
124a5('dul ba): dang dran ldan bsnyengs pa med/ /mkhas rnams 'dod pa rab tu 'chad pas na/ /'jig rten gsum du khyod kyi grags pa 'byung / /mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /srin po mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dag /thub pa'i drung du yang dang yang lhags
124a6('dul ba): nas/ /khyod la yang dang yang zhu mi bzod med/ /khyod ni snyan pa'i gsung gis dga' mdzad pas/ /mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /srin po yid gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che/ /khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar
124a7('dul ba): mchi'o/ /bzhengs dang bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang / /mnal dang mi gsung yang na gsung ba 'am/ /'on te lhung bzed chos gos bsnams pa dag /gau tam khyod kyi thams cad mdzes pa nyid/ /thogs pa med mnga' mi myur mnyam pas
124a8('dul ba): na/ /gsung ni snyan pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /mi yi mchog ni dus su gsung bas na/ /gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa lags/ /'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par grags/ /skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gtso/ /'jig
124b1('dul ba): rten lhar bcas 'di ni mtha' dag la/ /nga rgyal mi mnga' khyad du gsod mi mdzad/ mdza' ba dang ni mdza' ba ma lags dang / /mthun pa dang ni mthun pa ma lags dang / /g.yo' dang mi g.yo rang bzhin gnas pa la/ /ngo mtshar 'drin pa nam yang mi
124b2('dul ba): mnga'o/ /smre sngags 'don cing snying brtser smra ba dang / /kha chu 'dzags pas nyam thag skad 'byin dang / /yongs su gdungs dang rnam par gdungs ldan dang / /'jigs dang rims nad mya ngan gyis nyen pa/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya
124b3('dul ba): yis gtses pa dang / /yun ring nas ni mgon med bde ba med/ /srid pa'i sred par zhugs shing mun bsgribs pa'i/ /'gro ba 'khrugs pa la ni rab gzigs nas/ /bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mthu dag gis/ /thub pa
124b4('dul ba): thugs rje chen po 'jug mdzad cing / /shAkya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis/ /phongs par gyur rnams dgrol phyir brtson par mdzad/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas 'di dang / /srid pa'i sdug bsngal zad pa gang
124b5('dul ba): yin dang / /srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba yi/ /lam ni mtshungs pa med pa khyod kyis bshad/ /rnam par 'dren pa chen po brtson 'grus che/ /rab mchog pha rol smra ba rnams kyi mchog /'jig rten
124b6('dul ba): gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na/ /khyod las lhag pa lta zhig ga la mchis/ /khyod la khong khro rjes su chags mi mnga'/ /thub pa khyod la yongs su zag mi mnga'/ /sdug dang 'gal dang rtsod pa brtul zhugs
124b7('dul ba): bzang / /khyod la mi mnga' rtag tu mi mnga' lags/ /thub pa sdug dang mi sdug bde ba dang / /sdug bsngal mnyam dang de bzhin mi mnyam spangs/ /dga' dang mi dga' ba dag bzod mdzad de/ /yang dag bsdams shing
124b8('dul ba): 'di na nyer zhi spyod/ /smad pa byas kyang gnod pa mi mnga' la/ /rab tu bsngags pas khengs par mi 'gyur bas/ /grags pa grags pa ma yin khyod la mnyam/ /glang chen mche bar ldan pa g.yul ngo ru/ /
125a1('dul ba): 'dor ba drag tu 'phangs pa'i mda' dag ltar/ /skye bo sdig can rnams kyis smras pa yi/ /tshig ngan tshig rtsub dag kyang bzod par mdzad/ /drang srong khyod snyan gsung zhing tshig kyang bzod/ /shin tu ngan
125a2('dul ba): du smras pa 'ang mi bzod med/ /smad par smras sam dge bar smras kyang rung / /thub pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags/ /mchod 'os rtag par mi dang lha dag dang / /lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang ni/ /drang srong bdag nyid chen pos rtag mchod na/ /khyod
125a3('dul ba): ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'/ /'di bas bdag mchog ces kyang rlom mi mnga'/ /'di bas bdag chung zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'/ /bdag ni 'di dang mnyam zhes mi rlom pas/ /khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa gsum mi mnga'/ /brtan dang ldan la
125a4('dul ba): bong ba gser dang mtshungs/ /bai dUr+ya dang gseg ma gyo mor mtshungs/ /thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi/ /'gro ba 'di ni rtswa shing 'dra bar spyod/ /zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad nas/ /grang dang tsha ba'i rlung dag langs na yang / /ri yi dbang po lta bur
125a5('dul ba): bzod mdzad de/ /thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'/ /gzims cha dang ni stsang nas bshos dang ni/ /bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dag /thub pa zag med so sor brtags nas ni/ /de'i don du bsten par mdzad pa
125a6('dul ba): lags/ /mgon po bdag la med ces thugs ngan med/ /ma bcings legs gsung bdag gir 'dzin mi mnga'/ /gnod pa sna tshogs dag las yongs su grol/ /rnyed pa brnyes na'ang dgyes par mi 'gyur la/ /de ma brnyes pas
125a7('dul ba): kyang ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /khyad du gsod pa bzod pa mdzad cing 'dir/ /bkur sti dag la 'ang chags pa mi mnga' lags/ /lha gnas ri yi ngos las 'khrungs pa yi/ /khrag ltar dmar ba'i tsan dan mchog dag dang / /mda' dang ral gri rnon
125a8('dul ba): pos khyod kyi thugs/ /lan 'ga' yang ni 'gyur ba mi mnga' lags/ /don med gtam ni gsung bar mi mdzad gang / /skye bo ngan pas bsten pa'i gtam ma lags/ /rnyed pa'i gtam min zang zing bcas gtam min/ /bdag nyid che rnams
125b1('dul ba): mi 'dod ma lags kyi/ /gtam gang rab dben bde ba skyed byed cing / /rab tu zhi ba 'ba' zhig rab brjod pa/ /lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni gang dag cig /gsungs nas sdig pa rnam par 'dul ba gsungs/ /snyan pa rnams dang 'brel ba rnams
125b2('dul ba): dang ni/ /legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa yi/ /rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag thub pa che/ /'gro ba'i don slad rab tu gsung bar mdzad/ /mi mkhas dag dang log par lta rnams dang / /gzu lums can dang dga' bar ldan rnams dang / /
125b3('dul ba): phra ma can dang tshig rtsub sgyu can gang / /de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen/ /mi ni gang dag drang zhing sgyu med la/ /bden la dga' zhing dbang po thul ba dang / /rtag tu legs par brtags nas byed pa ni/ /de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi
125b4('dul ba): rkyen/ /chos mkhyen lugs mkhyen gang zag mkhyen pa dang / /drug po mngon mkhyen khyod la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /thub pa zhing mkhyen mchog dang mchog min mkhyen/ /tshul dang tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho
125b5('dul ba): rgya chen legs mthong nas/ /bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig yongs su brjod par bas/ /'phags pa khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol ni/ /rtogs par rngo thog 'gro ba'i nang na mi ma mchis/ /de lta bu la sogs pa bstod pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan
125b6('dul ba): 'das la bstod nas de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sngor gyur ji ltar stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bram ze sngor gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas song ste
125b7('dul ba): de lam du zhugs pa na/ bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig gi rgya lcag gis pags pa las thal ba tsam du brgyad de/ mkhan po khyod la kho bo cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma la bkur sti ma yin pa byos shig ces smras na/ khyod da gzod
125b8('dul ba): slar bstod de 'ong ngam/ shes ldan dag kho bos sngar kho bo'i lce ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te smad par 'os pa zhig na smod la/ bstod par 'os pa zhig na bstod do zhes snga mar smras sam/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bstod par 'os pas
126a1('dul ba): kho bos bstod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas bcom brlag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom brlag na rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bab
126a2('dul ba): bo/ /de nas bcom brlag na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma bcom brlag tu 'ongs na bdag gi rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bar chad byed par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
126a3('dul ba): spyan sngar sgren mor byed nas 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ lha mo re shig bud med ni shin tu bkab kyang bzang ba ma yin na sgren mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas lha mo de skyengs nas phyogs gcig tu song ngo / /de nas bcom
126a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis lam las bzur te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bcom brlag na ni nyes dmigs lnga
126a5('dul ba): po 'di dag yod de/ lnga gang zhe na mthon dman dang sdong dum dang tsher mas gang ba dang rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo mang ba dang / dgongs ka za ba dang bud med mang ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs par bcom brlag gi gnod sbyin
126a6('dul ba): bong bu'i gnas gang na ba de logs su gshegs te byon nas/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas byul te shing drung zhig tu rten cing nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu bong bu'i gzugs su byas nas 'phyan pa dang de la khye'u
126a7('dul ba): dang bu mo dag zhon pa dang / des de dag rtser bcug /dga' bar byed du bcug nas nags thibs por song nas za bar byed pas/ de'i ming gnod sbyin bong bu gnod sbyin bong bu zhes bya bar grags so/ /bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag
126a8('dul ba): dad pa can rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las lha mo zhig gis tho btsams pas/ bcom brlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas su gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang gtsang zhing
126b1('dul ba): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag so so nas snod du bcos shing bsdogs te shing rtar bcug nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
126b2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/
126b3('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
126b4('dul ba): to/ /btsun pa bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du 'dir gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis shing rta bkang ste 'tshal te mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste de bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
126b5('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus shig /bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod
126b6('dul ba): du gzhug go/ /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas pa de dag thams
126b7('dul ba): cad rim gro'i gnas su bsogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan
126b8('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsogs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
126b9('dul ba): da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /
127a1('dul ba): de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas zhes bya ba nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas
127a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni btul
127a3('dul ba): lags na/ btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu 'di bdag cag la yun ring po zhig nas sha khon ma mchis par ni sha khon bgyid/ 'gran zla ma lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal bar ni glags tshol bar bgyid de/ bus pa btsas
127a4('dul ba): shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste gnod sbyin bong bu gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
127a5('dul ba): 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu la bka' stsal pa/ bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so/ /bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis thos lags so/ /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig
127a6('dul ba): pa las log shig / bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi slad du phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rtsig par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na bdag ldog go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang
127a7('dul ba): khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag khyed cag gis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags te brtsig go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang btul to/ /bram ze dang
127a8('dul ba): khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis de'i ched du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin mda' can dang gnod sbyin nags ldan dang gnod sbyin mo bslang rnyed ma dang mchu rnams btul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom brlag tu zhugs so/ /
127b1('dul ba): zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo 'gran zla ma 'khor lnga brgya dang btul nas de'i don du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang dang phyi rol du gnod sbyin nyis stong lnga brgya btul nas de'i
127b2('dul ba): ched du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nyis stong lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das o ta lar gshegs te/ o ta lar o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /de na bram ze shing sa la
127b3('dul ba): chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te o ta lar
127b4('dul ba): bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing pa lnga brgya tsam mgo bo rdul gyis yog cing sha na'i ras kyis smad g.yogs bgos nas zhing rmed pa las zhing pa de rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu
127b5('dul ba): rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ gzi brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chos bshad pas zhes bya ba nas mchod par bya ba dang rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to
127b6('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas rmon pa stong po de dag gnya' shing dang ru thag bcad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskor te 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum
127b7('dul ba): gyi chos bshad pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes nas zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
127b8('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa zhing pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur nas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skyes shing 'di rnams ni rmon par gyur lags/ dge slong dag
128a1('dul ba): 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ 'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rnams kyis de na le los dus 'das par
128a2('dul ba): byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur to/ /rmon pa 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung nas bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams la gus par ma byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro
128a3('dul ba): rnams su skyes so/ /'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /dge slong dag de lta
128a4('dul ba): bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bus dge sbyong shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
128a5('dul ba): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang o ta lar byon nas/ o ta la na o ta la'i nags khrod
128a6('dul ba): na bzhugs te/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i dge ba dang / grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags par gyur te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin
128a7('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
128a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa skye dgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par
128b1('dul ba): byas nas bdag gi zag pa zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing / des chos bshad pa ni thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang
128b2('dul ba): po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa rnam par byang ba 'ba' zhig ston to zhes thos nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni legs pa yin/ nye bar 'gro ba ni legs pa yin/ bsnyen bkur byed pa ni legs
128b3('dul ba): p a yin no snyam du bsams nas shing rta rta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba spyi
128b4('dul ba): blugs thogs te o ta la nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs ti rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra
128b5('dul ba): ba'i nang du zhugs nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i
128b6('dul ba): gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa
128b7('dul ba): dang yul tha dad pa can rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi/ gzhan gyis spyod yul dang yul gzhan nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang rna ba'i dbang po dang sna'i dbang po dang lce'i
128b8('dul ba): dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po gang dag lags pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong bar bgyid pa ni gang lags/ de rnams kyi ston pa yang gang lags/ bram ze dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang / yul tha dad
129a1('dul ba): pa can 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang rna ba'i dbang po dang sna'i dbang po dang lce'i dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba ni yid yin no/ /
129a2('dul ba): de rnams kyi rton pa yang yid yin no/ /kye gau ta ma yid kyi rton pa gang lags/ bram ze yid kyi rton pa ni dran pa yin no/ /kye gau ta ma dran pa'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze dran pa'i rton pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no/ /kye gau ta ma dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa
129a3('dul ba): gang lags/ bram ze dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa gang lags/ bram ze byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa ni rig pa dang rnam par grol
129a4('dul ba): ba yin no/ /kye gau ta ma rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /kye gau ta ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze ha cang thal ches so ha cang
129a5('dul ba): thal ches so dri ba rnams kyi mtha' gzung bar mi nus te/ nga'i drung du ni yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par bya ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi mthar bya ba'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar
129a6('dul ba): thug pa can spyod par byed do/ /de nas bram ze o ta la'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la gnod pa ci zhig bya snyam mo/ /des kyang sngon dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab na des ci bsam
129a7('dul ba): pa dang ci gsol pa de thams cad so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes thos so/ /de nas bram ze o ta la'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
129a8('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te
129b1('dul ba): lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas smon lam log pa gdab par brtsams pa bdag gis shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed cig bshos
129b2('dul ba): gsol ba 'di thams cad bdag gi glang du gyur cig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram ze o ta la'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bram ze o ta la'i bu la 'di skad ces
129b3('dul ba): bka' stsal to/ /bram ze khyod kyis mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dge slong 'di thams cad ni yang srid pa zad pa yin gyis/ sems gzhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
129b4('dul ba): yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
129b5('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze o ta la'i bus smon lam log pas bslang ba'i sems sdig pa can bskyed kyis/ khyod cag gis zan zos nas gtsug lag khang gi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cig dang log pa'i smon lam
129b6('dul ba): 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / o ta la na bran mo rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes
129b7('dul ba): bya ba zhig gnas te/ de bum pa thogs nas chu chur khron pa'i drung du song ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
129b8('dul ba): song la rgan mo pha bi la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis chu phul cig ces sgo shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgan mo ka tsang ga la gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rgan
130a1('dul ba): mo ka tsang ga la la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ka tsang ga la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis chu phul cig des smras pa 'phags pa bdag nyid 'tshal te mchi'o/ /de nas ka tsang ga las chus bum pa bkang nas rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
130a2('dul ba): der song ba dang ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa rin po che'i ri bo
130a3('dul ba): 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu yang de la bu'i sdug pa skyes nas des lag pa bsgreng ste bu bu zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis de bzlog go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
130a4('dul ba): dag khyed kyis rgan mo 'di ma zlog shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang / /rtag tu nga yi yum gyur pas/ /nga yi sku la reg pa las/ /gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na/ /de'u re mod la khrag dron dag /'di yi kha nas skyug par 'gyur/ /bu la gdung ba 'di
130a5('dul ba): mthong nas/ /byas pa gzo ba rjes dgongs te/ /thugs rje dang ni thugs brtse bas/ /sku la reg tu gnang bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgur nas 'khyud du gnang bas de bu la chags pa dang bral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug
130a6('dul ba): go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
130a7('dul ba): ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas ma bgyis te mas ma lags zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i
130a8('dul ba): dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang gsol pa/ ma la lan
130b1('dul ba): du phan 'dogs pa'i/ /bu mchog gis ni bgyi ba gang / /thar la sems gzhol 'gyur ba de/ /khyod kyis de ring bdag la mdzod/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/ /drangs te mtho ris thar la bzhag /khyod ni brtsal ba chen po yis/ /dka' ba legs
130b2('dul ba): par mdzad pa lags/ /zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na ka tsang ga las jo bo la gsol ba btab nas bcom
130b3('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
130b4('dul ba): bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i
130b5('dul ba): bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/ /de nas des rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no/ /des brtson 'grus dang 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra
130b6('dul ba): bcom mar gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas rjed par bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum bcu rtsa bdun pa/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan
130b7('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsdus te mdor bka' stsal nas/ gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir 'jug par mdzad pa de'i tshe ka tsang ga las de rgyas par lung ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
130b8('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma ka tsang ga la 'di mchog yin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams
131a1('dul ba): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ka tsang ga las las ci zhig bgyis na des na rgas nas rab tu byung bar gyur/ las ci zhig bgyis na des na dbul ba dang bran mor gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis srid
131a2('dul ba): pa tha ma de'i mngal du ma bzung bar gyur/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis shing bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
131a3('dul ba): pa/ dge slong dag dge slong ma ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa dag ces bya ba nas/ /lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas
131a4('dul ba): pa na 'di nga'i yum du gyur te/ gang gi tshe nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe 'dis nga bzlog pas las de'i rnam par smin pas rgas nas rab tu byung ngo / /nga sbyin pa gtong ba na 'dis bar chad byas pas des na dbul bar gyur to/ /ji ltar sgyu
131a5('dul ba): 'phrul chen mo ltar 'dis bsod nams dang dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ba'i las ma byas te/ des na nga'i srid pa tha ma 'dis mngal du ma bzung ngo / /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab tu byung nas dge slong ma slob pa dang mi
131a6('dul ba): slob pa rnams la bran mo zhes tshig tu brjod pas des na bran mor gyur to/ /des na 'dis gang dag blags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing
131a7('dul ba): 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas/ des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /rab tu 'byin pa'i
131a8('dul ba): mkhan mo gang yin pa de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa dang / de na 'dis kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yang
131b1('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yon gnas bla na med pa la tshe ji srid cig tu tshangs par spyod pa la spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
131b2('dul ba): ' das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa
131b3('dul ba): de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bcom ldan
131b4('dul ba): 'das shAkya thub pa des mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces byas te/ de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis ngas da ltar mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag de
131b5('dul ba): lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ /dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka'
131b6('dul ba): stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yul dgra mtha' gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
131b7('dul ba): mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na kun dga' ra ba zhig na bram ze zhig khron pa nas chu bcus shing kun dga' ra ba bcu bar brtsams so/ /bram ze des rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /
131b8('dul ba): mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma kun dga' ra bar zhugs na kun dga' ra ba dang chu ma rung bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas sgo bcad de spyang thag dang chu snod sbas nas 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul
132a1('dul ba): gyis kun dga' ra bar zhugs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis khron pa de bzung nas kun dga' ra ba de thams cad chus yog par byas so/ /de nas bram ze de dag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no/ /
132a2('dul ba): snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur te gsol pa/ shes ldan gau ta ma tshur spyon/ dpyang thag ni 'di lags/ chab snod ni 'di lags kyis chab ci bder bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
132a3('dul ba): pa/ gal te kun na chu yod na/ /khron pa'i chus ko ci zhig bya/ /'dir ni sred pa'i rtsa bcad nas/ /gang zhig yongs su brtsal bar spyod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i
132a4('dul ba): chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka'
132a5('dul ba): stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /des brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal bar byas nas nyon mongs
132a6('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
132a7('dul ba): 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang yul dgra mthar gshegs te/ dgra mtha' na sbu bu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dgra mtha' na rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa
132a8('dul ba): dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang dgra mthar byon nas/ dgra mtha' na sbu bu can gyi shing
132b1('dul ba): nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so zhes thos so thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni mtha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur la/ gal te bdag gis dge
132b2('dul ba): sbyong gau ta ma la bkur sti ma byas na mtha'i rgyal phran rnams shes ldan dag kye ma rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin ni byis pa yin te/ de'i grong dang zhing na dge sbyong gau ta ma nye bar rten cing bzhugs na bsnyen bkur ma byas so zhes smod par 'gyur gyis/ ma
132b3('dul ba): la bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang / rgyal po chen po'i mthus dgra mtha' nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang
132b4('dul ba): na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
132b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin stan las
132b6('dul ba): langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /shes ldan gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la dgung zla gsum du na
132b7('dul ba): bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la cang mi gsung
132b8('dul ba): bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de rang gi khyim
133a1('dul ba): du song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sna bcwa brgyad dang / sran tshod sna tshogs dang / tshod ma ro dang ldan pa dang / 'bras chan rab tu mang por tshos shig /dgra mthar dril sgrogs su bcug
133a2('dul ba): pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma zla ba gsum du gzhan gyis gdugs tshod ma gsol cig /gang zhig gis gdugs tshod gsol na de ni chad par gsad do zhes des de skad du dril bsgrags nas nub mo nyal ba dang rmi lam na bdag gi rgyu mas dgra mtha'i
133a3('dul ba): grong khyer thams cad bskor ba rmis so/ /rmis nas kyang sngangs skrag bred cing spu zing zhes byed nas myur ba myur bar mal chen po nas langs te/ lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad
133a4('dul ba): du mi 'gyur grang snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las de nam nangs nas bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam zhig mthong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/ 'di
133a5('dul ba): ltar lhas rmang lam bzang po zhig rmis te gal te bdag gis de dang 'thun par bsnyad na 'di lhag par yang dge sbyong gau ta ma la dad pa skyed par 'gyur gyi ma la bdag gis 'di ngan par bsnyad do snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ lha rmang lam mi
133a6('dul ba): bzang lags so/ /mkhan po 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur/ lha gdon ma 'tshal bar rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am srog gi bar chad du 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ e ma'o kyi hud bdag rgyal srid las nyams
133a7('dul ba): pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas bram ze mdun na 'don la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gis na kho bo rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci
133a8('dul ba): yod/ des smras pa/ lha gal te mi gda' ba'i phyogs su zla ba gsum bzhugs na/ des na lha rgyal srid las mi nyams shing srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur lags so/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bsams pa gal te de lta na
133b1('dul ba): de bya sla bas dril sgrogs su gzhug go snyam nas/ des yul thams cad du dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ nga la zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye bar su yang ma 'ong shig /gang zhig 'ongs na de ni chad par gsad do zhes dril sgrogs su bcug nas zla ba
133b2('dul ba): gsum du mi snang ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba las/ ji tsam na rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams sems
133b3('dul ba): las chung ngus 'khod pa dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci sems las chung ngus 'khod dam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig bgyir mchis/ rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la
133b4('dul ba): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs sam/ khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod nas gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed/ gdan yang mi shom na ci sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
133b5('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gcod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo lhas lnga brgya rnams kyi ched du zhal zas bsod pa mang du sta gon byos shig ces ni bka' stsal gyi/ che ge mo zhig gi don du'o zhes bka' ma stsal
133b6('dul ba): lags so/ /shes ldan dag deng lha la zhus shig /'phags pa lhas dril sgrogs su stsal ba/ nga la zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye bar su yang ma 'ong shig /gang zhig 'ongs na de chad par gsad do zhes bsgrags na ci bdag cag la mgo bo
133b7('dul ba): gnyis mchis sam/ bdag cag ni mi zhu lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
133b8('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang dag
134a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des zhal zas gsol cig ces sbron cig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas snam
134a2('dul ba): sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba
134a3('dul ba): gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des zhal zas gsol cig / dgra mtha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag cag lta zhig re res kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la
134a4('dul ba): zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro lags mod kyi/ rgyal po sdig can 'dis dril sgrogs su stsal ba/ gzhan sus kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te zla ba gsum du zhal zas ma gsol cig /gang
134a5('dul ba): zhig gis zhal zas gsol na de ni chad par gsad do zhes bsgrags lags so/ /ji tsam na byang phyogs nas ded dpon zhig rta lnga brgya la khal bkal te dgra mthar phyin nas des bsams pa/ gal te mod la chas na rta rnams kyi rmig pa dub
134a6('dul ba): pas 'theng bar 'gyur zhing lom par yang mi 'gyur bas 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ de de nyid du 'dug nas des rta cang shes la ni chas nas bre'u chung do/ rta lhag ma rnams la ni bre'u chung re rer thang bcad do/ /des
134a7('dul ba): rgyal pos rtsis mgo 'di dang 'di dag byas so zhes thos la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa yang thos nas des bsams pa/ bdag ni rgyal po 'di'i yul na gnas pa ma yin pas bdag la rgyal pos ci byar yod snyam du rig nas tshe
134a8('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag gis rta cang shes la ni chas nas bre'u chung do/ rta lhag ma rnams la ni bre'u chung re re'i thang lags na/ gal te bcom ldan 'das nas gsol bar spro na/
134b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la ni bdag gis nas bre'u chung do do/ dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni bre'u chung re re dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par
134b2('dul ba): gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las nga nyid kyis byas shing bsags pas nga
134b3('dul ba): nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur te/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes
134b4('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims te/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig dgra mthar zla ba gsum du longs
134b5('dul ba): spyad par spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces sgo shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas tshul shing brim par brtsams pa na/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar
134b6('dul ba): dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang bas tshul shing blangs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bser ma'i bro nad mchis pas dgung zla gsum du stsang nas kyis longs spyad par mi spro lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud
134b7('dul ba): gal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/ bdag ni 'di'i bro g.yog lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu dgra mthar dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
134b8('dul ba): shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu ni ri bo rtse gsum gyi khar song ste dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bdud rtsis bstabs so de nas ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la ni nas bre'u chung do do 'bul lo/ /
135a1('dul ba): dge slong gzhan rnams la bre'u chung re re'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byos shig /btsun pa bka'
135a2('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal blangs te bud med rgan mo gzhan zhig gang na yod pa der song nas phyin pa dang / bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
135a3('dul ba): sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su bya na khyod nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rgan mos rngo mi thog ste 'on kyang bu mo 'di gzhon lags kyis 'di la stsol cig dang / 'dis ni ci legs su bgyid
135a4('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i drung du song ste phyin nas smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byed nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag dang dam zhig
135a5('dul ba): bca' ste/ gal te bdag la tshig 'ga' gsung ba lta na ci legs su bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ byi dor gyis shig dang smra'o/ /de nas 'dru zhing dris pa/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
135a6('dul ba): bsams pa/ gal te 'di la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zab pa yin pas 'dis shes par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di la 'khor los
135a7('dul ba): sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na rin po che sna bdun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bdun po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor
135a8('dul ba): lo rin po che dang / glang rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che yin no/ /sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na
135b1('dul ba): 'khor lo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la mgo khrus byas te smyung ba byas nas/ de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la blon po'i
135b2('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug pa na shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rin po che lte ba dang bcas pa/ rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ myu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ mdzes pa/ mkhan bzos ma byas pa/ bzang po thams
135b3('dul ba): cad gser las byas pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gang yin pa 'dis gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba nas thams cad gser las byas zhes bya ba nas de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos so zhes
135b4('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bdag ni gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'khor lo rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
135b5('dul ba): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'khor lo rin po che de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste lag pa g.yas pas spor cing / kye 'khor lo rin po che sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i
135b6('dul ba): lam srol gang yin par rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig / rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig ces smra'o/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spar ba dang / steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas shar phyogs
135b7('dul ba): su sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin pa nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo rin po che de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
135b8('dul ba): phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing / shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i
136a1('dul ba): rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces lha tshur gshegs/ lha byon pa legs so/ /yul 'khor 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang
136a2('dul ba): lags pa 'di ni lha'i lags kyis/ lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/ bdag cag ni lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so zhes smras pa dang / de'i phyir sna bo dag khyed cag rang rang gi yul 'khor chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i chos
136a3('dul ba): ma yin pas ni ma yin no/ /'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam 'dren mar spyod pa zhig yod na/ khyed kyis de yul 'khor du ma bzhag cig /de lta na khyed cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che de shar phyogs mngon
136a4('dul ba): par phab nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste/ lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor los
136a5('dul ba): sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spar ba dang / steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas byang phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo rin po che de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los
136a6('dul ba): sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par
136a7('dul ba): 'gyur zhing / byang phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces lha tshur gshegs/ lha byon pa legs so/ /
136a8('dul ba): yul 'khor 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di ni lha'i lags kyis/ lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/ bdag cag ni lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags
136b1('dul ba): so zhes smras pa dang / de'i phyir sna bo dag khyed cag rang rang gi yul rnams chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/ /'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/ 'dren mar spyod na khyed kyis yul 'khor du ma bzhag shig /de lta na khyed
136b2('dul ba): cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che des byang phyogs mngon par phab nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin nas dkor khang gi steng du srog shing btsugs pa bzhin
136b3('dul ba): du gnas so/ /sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na 'khor lo rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na glang po rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig
136b4('dul ba): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i glang po ni thal kar me tog ku mu da'i mdog lta bu yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i
136b5('dul ba): rgyal pos 'di mthong na sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/ kye ma'o glang po rin po che bzang po zhig yin gyis myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas
136b6('dul ba): bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa khyod kyis glang po rin po che 'di myur ba kho nar legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan mkhas pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i
136b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas/ glang po rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed de/ de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad slob pa na nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs
136b8('dul ba): pa ni dper na glang po che gzhan rnams lo du ma dang / lo khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/ glang po rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad bslabs pa na nyin zhag gcig gis
137a1('dul ba): bslab pa thams cad lobs so/ /de dul bar rig nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed de/ lha glang po rin po che bzang po ni dul lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i
137a2('dul ba): rgyal pos glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che de la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal tshus la 'bab ste/ sring mo 'khor
137a3('dul ba): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na glang po rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na rta rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/
137a4('dul ba): sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rta ni thams cad sngo ba mgo gnag cing rngog mjug sdug pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos de mthong nas sems mngon par dad par gyur
137a5('dul ba): nas kye ma rta rin po che bzang po zhig yin gyis myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa khyod kyis rta rin po che 'di myur ba kho nas
137a6('dul ba): legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig / lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rta mkhan mkhas pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po las mnyan nas/ rta rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed de/ de la bslab pa
137a7('dul ba): thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs pa ni dper na rta gzhan rnams lo du ma dang / lo khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/ rta rin
137a8('dul ba): po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad slob pa na nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so/ /de dul bar rig nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed de/ lha rta rin po che bzang po ni dul lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen
137b1('dul ba): par mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta rin po che brtag par 'dod nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po bskor te rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal tshus la 'bab
137b2('dul ba): ste/ sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na rta rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na nor bu rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo 'di
137b3('dul ba): la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor bu ni zur brgyad yod pa/ bai dUr+ya bzang po'i rigs can/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ rnam par dang ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang na me mar gyi bya ba thams cad nor bu de'i 'od kyis byed do/ /
137b4('dul ba): de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod nas mun gnag smag tu gyur la/ lhas mtshan mo char gyi rgyun dal bu dal bus 'bebs shing / glog 'gyu ba'i dus su nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo
137b5('dul ba): la bzhag nas bskyed mos tshal gyi nang du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong ba na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po ji snyed pa thams cad dang / rgyang grags phyed kho ra khor yug tu nor bu'i
137b6('dul ba): 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te/ sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na nor bu rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na btsun mo rin po che ji
137b7('dul ba): lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo ni gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ ha cang mi dkar ba/ ha cang mi sngo ba/ nya khar ba ltar lpags pa
137b8('dul ba): 'jam pa/ ha cang mi ring ba/ ha cang mi thung ba/ bong ran pa/ ha cang mi sbom pa/ ha cang mi skem pa/ ha cang mi tsho ba/ sha bri ran pa gang yin pa ste/ sring mo de ni grang ba'i tshe lus la reg na dro ba/ tsha ba'i tshe lus la reg na bsil ba/ yul ka ling ka'i
138a1('dul ba): gos ltar reg na 'jam pa'o/ /sring mo de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /kha nas ni ut+pa la sngon po'i dri 'byung ngo / /ji srid kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun mo rin po che'i bar du bshad pa de
138a2('dul ba): srid kyis bu mo des kyang nas kyi bya ba zin nas/ des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig /de nas tshe dang
138a3('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos nas byi dor byas pa khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
138a4('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo nas 'di su zhig gis byi dor byas/ btsun pa bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig gis bgyis lags so/ /kun dga' bo khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam dag
138a5('dul ba): byas sam/ bcom ldan 'das bgyis lags so/ /kun dga' bo des na khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad nga la rgyas par gsol cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bram ze'i
138a6('dul ba): bu mo dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun
138a7('dul ba): dga' bo khyod kyis ci'i phyir bu mo de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa ma brjod/ btsun pa bdag gis 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi chos ni zab pa lags pas bu mo 'dis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis so snyam du
138a8('dul ba): bsams nas/ de'i slad du bdag gis de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod lags so/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te/ khyod kyis gal te de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod pa byas na/ des bla na med pa yang dag par
138b1('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod pa zhig / kun dga' bo 'on kyang bu mo de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes
138b2('dul ba): dmigs gang ci byung ba des ni dge slong rnams seng ras gyon nas khyim gyi nang du 'gro ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis seng ras gyon te khyim gyi nang du 'gro bar mi bya'o/ song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ kun du bram ze'i bu
138b3('dul ba): m o che ge mo zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi don du nas byi dor byas pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan to zhes sgra grags pa dag bu mo lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba zhig gis thos
138b4('dul ba): nas/ dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba rnams kyi nas byi dor byas te/ de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag de'i 'khor du gyur cig /ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis nas kyi bshos gsol bar brtsams pa dang /
138b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe brgyud pa de dang de rnams su phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bcad cing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de
138b6('dul ba): da ni nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta zhes mchi ma dbyung bar brtsams so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing mchi ma glog /btsun pa bcom ldan
138b7('dul ba): 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs na rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste/ phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bkum zhing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes pa
138b8('dul ba): de da ni stsang nas rul ba'i bshos gsol ba lta snyam bgyid lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi zan za bar 'dod dam/
139a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mche ba'i bar nas nas kyi zan phyung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bza' bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das
139a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis sngon 'di lta bu'i ro myong bar dran nam/ btsun pa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skyes shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs las chen por gyur lags na/ da ltar bcom
139a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi mche ba'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi bshos 'di lta bu'i ro ni sngon myong bar mi dran lags so/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ro bro ba'i mchog ces bya ba ro rnams 'phrog pa yongs
139a4('dul ba): su dag pa yod de/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas kha zas phal pa la longs spyad na de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ro brgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
139a5('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo zhes sgra bsgrags so/ /mtha'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis
139a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/ mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo zhes thos nas/ de rnams kyis rgyal po bram ze mes
139a7('dul ba): sbyin la pho nya btang ba las de rnams nang du ma chud de sgo na sdod do/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas 'bras sa lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste bskur ro/ /de nas bdud sdig can de 'di
139a8('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma la bdag gis lan mang po zhig tho btsam par byas na lan 'ga' yang skabs ma rnyed gyis/ 'dir yang re shig 'di la brgal bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
139b1('dul ba): bor bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gar 'dong / de rnams kyis smras pa 'phags pa kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
139b2('dul ba): dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don du
139b3('dul ba): 'bras sa lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya po 'di bskur ba lags so/ /des smras pa shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das la ni lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams mngon par dad de/ gal te nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzed na
139b4('dul ba): der yang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i bdud rtsis 'gengs par byed na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nas gsol/ slar log shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag
139b5('dul ba): cag chas lags na da ci ste ldog mchi'o/ /bdud kyis bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di dag bzlog par ma nus kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o zhes de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas char pa shing rta'i srog
139b6('dul ba): shing tsam gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams te/ des re shig shing rta de dag gi lte ba man chad nub pa de tsam gyi bar du char phab bo/ /de nas shing rta de dag gi glang rnams bkrol te dong ngo / /de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis
139b7('dul ba): kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni ri rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas lha'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/ /de nas ded
139b8('dul ba): dpon des zla ba gsum 'das nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bskyed mos tshal du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
140a1('dul ba): maud gal gyi bu gnyis ri bo rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas pa yang 'ongs so/ /de nas ded dpon gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das
140a2('dul ba): kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag
140a3('dul ba): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig / rta cang shes ni bu rgyal tshab tu gyur cig /rta lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang bu lnga brgyar gyur cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan pa gang lags pa de ni bdag gi
140a4('dul ba): btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig / bud med lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba gang lags pa de ni de'i 'khor du gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka'
140a5('dul ba): stsal to/ /ded dpon khyod ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rta cang shes ni khyod kyi bu rgyal tshab tu 'gyur ro/ /rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang bu lnga brgyar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo de ni btsun mo rin po cher 'gyur ro/ /bud med lnga
140a6('dul ba): brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba de dag kyang de'i 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
140a7('dul ba): pa/ kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi drung du song la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyed kyi yul du kho bos zla ba gsum gnas zin te 'gros shes par gyis shig ces kyang smros shig /btsun
140a8('dul ba): pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin bkra shis 'ong ba la sdod cing 'dug go/ /
140b1('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo ba'i skyes pa la smras pa/ kye nang rje tshur khyod rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gang na ba der song la phyin nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la 'di skad ces dge slong kun dga' bo lha mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo
140b2('dul ba): na sdod cing mchis so zhes smros shig / 'phags pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo ba'i skyes pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i ltar mnyan nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin
140b3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha dge slong 'phags pa kun dga' bo lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /des smras pa/ kye skyes bu nga bkra shis 'ong ba sdod cing 'dug gis dge slong kun dga' bo ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen
140b4('dul ba): po dang ldan pa yin te/ de nyid nga'i bkra shis su gyur cig /de la ni bzang po lnga yod de/ ming bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / kha dog bzang ba dang / spobs pa bzang ba dang / sgrub pa bzang ba yin gyis nang du spyon cig /shes ldan kun
140b5('dul ba): dga' bo la su zhig 'gog / sgo bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin du smras nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nang du zhugs so/ /mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de rnams kyang de nyid dang lhan cig nang du zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang
140b6('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la nad med par gyur cig ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
140b7('dul ba): rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod nad med par gyur cig /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du ngas zla ba gsum du gnas zin te 'gros shes par gyis shig ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas
140b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dang ji ga yul dgra mthar dbyar bde bar bzhugs sam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal bar ma gyur grang / mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de dag gis smras pa/
141a1('dul ba): lha khyod ni rgyal srid la mi rtog pa lags te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni zla ba gsum du nas rul pa'i
141a2('dul ba): bshos gsol lags so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum du nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba mad dam/ rgyal po chen po mad lags so/ /de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang
141a3('dul ba): po zhig gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang / blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag rnams la nyin re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa rab tu mang po sta gon gyis shig par ma bsgo 'am/
141a4('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de kho na skad bka' stsal pa mchis kyis che ge mo zhig la stsol cig ces ni khyed kyis bka' ma stsal te/ 'on kyang da dung du zhal zas sta gon kho na bgyid do/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin
141a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram
141a6('dul ba): ze mes sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis
141a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nongs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa nongs lags te/ ji ltar yang bus pa lags/ ji ltar yang
141a8('dul ba): rmongs pa lags/ ji ltar yang mi gsal ba lags/ ji ltar yang mi mkhas pa lags te/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla gsum du spyan drangs nas mi gda' ba'i phyogs su mchis lags so// //
141b1('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nongs pa de glo bar chud cing nongs par mthong lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste nongs pa la nongs par gzung du gsol/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis
141b2('dul ba): nyes pa la nyes par khas blangs na bden te/ ji ltar na yang bus pa yin/ ji ltar na yang rmongs pa yin/ ji ltar na yang mi gsal ba yin/ ji ltar na yang mi mkhas pa yin te/ gang yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mi snang
141b3('dul ba): ba'i phyogs na 'dug gam/ rgyal po chen po gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyes pa shes shing mthong la de mthong nas 'chags par byed na/ khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/ /
141b4('dul ba): rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing mthong la de mthong nas 'chags shing phyir sdom par byed na/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/ /de nas
141b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims
141b6('dul ba): cha dang / snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshe thung ngu'i dus su byung zhing gdul ba'i
141b7('dul ba): don bya ba ni rab tu mang la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la yang 'bab pas mi gnang ngo / /gal te de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das lo bdun nam/ zla ba bdun nam/ dgung bdun zhig gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
141b8('dul ba): der yang ma gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na
142a1('dul ba): gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gal te 'di'i zas gcig kyang gsol bar ma gnang na rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin khrag dron du skyugs nas dus las 'da' bar 'gyur ba
142a2('dul ba): gang yin pa de'i gnas yod do snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas zhabs gnyis
142a3('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te rang gi gnas gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams cad sangs rgyas
142a4('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha zhal zas 'di thams cad dog sa la bkram la dge slong rnams kyi zhabs kyis bcags na de
142a5('dul ba): ltar na yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur lags so/ /des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag kha zas ji snyed yod pa 'di thams cad sa la kun du khrom shig /de rnams kyis thams cad kun du
142a6('dul ba): bkram mo/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams
142a7('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na rgan zhugs zhig mi bzod pa skyes te bdag cag zla ba gsum du nas rul ba zos nas da ni rgyal po sdig can 'di'i 'byor pa ston to snyam du bsams nas bza' ba dang bca'
142a8('dul ba): ba sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phags pa rnams ni bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed do zhes smod par byed/ phyar kha gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de
142b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas reg par byed pa yin no snyam nas/ dge slong
142b2('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pas bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams smod par byed/ phyar kha gtong
142b3('dul ba): bar byed/ kha zer bar byed do/ /de lta bas na dge slong gis bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas bcag par mi bya'o/ /bcags na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas
142b4('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches
142b5('dul ba): dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
142b6('dul ba): ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag
142b7('dul ba): par 'dzin du 'jug / yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas
142b8('dul ba): pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge
143a1('dul ba): slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag gis yul dgra mtha' rnams su dgung zla gsum mchis lags kyis/ btsun pa spyil bu gzhig lags so/ /dge slong
143a2('dul ba): dag khyed kyis spyil bu ma gzhig shig / spyil bu rnams ji srid du yun ring du gnas par gyur pa de srid du sbyin bdag gi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid dang / bsod nams skyed par 'gyur ba nyid do/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni sbyin
143a3('dul ba): pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos la gnas pa zhig gang gis gtsug
143a4('dul ba): lag khang na gnas shing sems kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas na gzhi de las sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
143a5('dul ba): bde ba'i gzhi dpag tu med par rig par bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang ji lta bar chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal yang de dang 'dra ste/ bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi
143a6('dul ba): bzhi po 'di dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad re shig bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes gzung bar mi nus
143a7('dul ba): te/ 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /dper na chu bo chen po lnga po 'di lta lte/ gang gA dang / ya mu na dang / sar yu dang / gnas ldan dang / chen po zhes bya ba de dag 'bab cing 'dre bar 'gyur
143a8('dul ba): ba de la ni chu'i tshad chu 'am/ chu bum pa 'am/ chu bum pa brgya 'am/ chu bum pa stong ngam/ chu bum pa brgya stong 'di snyed ces gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i tshogs chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du bsod nams kyi rgyu
143b1('dul ba): mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo
143b2('dul ba): zhes gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho bkra shis gtsang la dag /ngogs bde rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho mchog der/ /mi dang ri dgas tshogs
143b3('dul ba): kyis bsten pa yi/ /chu bo so so nas 'bab 'du ba ltar/ /de bzhin gos dang zas skom ster ba'i mi/ /mal cha stan dang gding ba sbyin byed la/ /bsod nams rgyun ni kun nas 'du 'gyur te/ /dper na rgya mtshor chu klung 'bab pa bzhin/ /
143b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ gang gis na phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bkum pa
143b5('dul ba): la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis slongs mo ba'i skye bo tshim par mdzad de/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du sems can gyi don gyi slad du bdag nyid 'o brgyal nas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad lags pa/ yul dgra mtha'
143b6('dul ba): na dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu nas rul ba gsol la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni bdud rtsi 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin
143b7('dul ba): gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub
143b8('dul ba): pa na 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
144a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de 'khor dge slong brgyad khri dang rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na
144a2('dul ba): tshogs rnams slob par byed pa'i bram ze zhig lnga brgya'i tshogs la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang lhag par bkur sti byas/ rim gror byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas te dgra bcom
144a3('dul ba): par bkur ro/ /gang kho na nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du gshegs pa de kho na nas bzung ste/ de la su yang bkur sti bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang /
144a4('dul ba): mchod par bya ba mi byed pa dang / de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la shin tu phrag dog skyes par gyur to/ /ji tsam na dge slong slob pa dang mi slob pa rab tu mang
144a5('dul ba): po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chan gyis lhung bzed bkang nas slar
