209b7('dul ba): gal te 'di mthong na btsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du bdag nyid kyis dbul lo snyam nas/ de nas de zhags pas bcings bzhin rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzangs gang na ba der khrid de
209b8('dul ba): song nas phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bdag gis bud med rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal te mchis na bzhes su gsol/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma gzugs bzang
210a1('dul ba): mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad 'dus pa/ bud med kyi mtshan bcwa brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ yul gyi mi bas bzang ba/ nu ma gser gyi bum pa dang ru sbal ltar rgyas zhing
210a2('dul ba): rlo ba dang / mkhrang zhing mkhregs pas shin du legs par zlum pa ldem pa/ mig mthon mthing la rtsa dmar zhing dkyus ring la pad ma gzhon nu 'dra ba/ sna'i gzangs ring zhing mtho ba/ ma mchu byi ru dang nor bu dang rin po che dang /
210a3('dul ba): bim pa'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ 'gram pa ma rnyongs shing yongs su rgyas pa/ mkhur tshos lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thig le can/ smin ma rim gyis mdzes shing 'jar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/ dpung
210a4('dul ba): pa zla ba nya ba dri ma med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba/ lto gnyer ma zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam rnyong ba/ nu ma'i g.yur gyis ro stod bags kyis 'dud la/ dku shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin tu mdzes pa/ lag pa
210a5('dul ba): chu shing gi snying po 'dra ba brla byin gyis phra bar zlum pas mdzes pa/ rtsa shin du mi mngon zhing gya gyu med pas yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang mgul gdub dang rkang gdub dang gdu bu dang do shal dang /
210a6('dul ba): se mo do'i sgras 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ skra gnag la 'jam pa/ bde sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan cing gser gyi 'og pag can/ lto phyang nge ba do shal mang po dpyangs pa/ mdog gser btso ma ltar bzang ba mthong ngo / /
210a7('dul ba): mthong ma thag tu gzhon nu 'dod chags kyi zhags pa chu zla dri ma med cing gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhin lta bur gzung dka' ba/ klung chu rlabs dang bcas pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs par dga' ba/ nam mkha' lding dang rlung
210a8('dul ba): gi shugs dang 'dra bar 'gro ba/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur myur du 'gyur ba/ spre'u ltar sa gcig na mi 'dug pas g.yo zhing tsab yab can gyis ni dam du zin/ 'dod chags kyi mda' rtag tu nyon mongs pa bsten pa goms pa'i
210b1('dul ba): 'dod chags kyi bde ba ro myong ba la brkam pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa las mi zlogs pa/ bzang mo la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis shin tu dri ma can du byas pa/ phrad par 'dod pas shin tu dbyung mi
210b2('dul ba): bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni snying po la phog ste/ me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel te smras pa/ dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'gyu ba ltar/ /bzhin ras zla ba 'dra de nor
210b3('dul ba): bzangs kyis mthong ste/ /de la chags pa'i 'dod pa steg tshol las byung ba'i/ /'dod chags mda' yis de yi sems la phog / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa/ de nas rgyal bu nor bzangs kyis yid 'phrog ma
210b4('dul ba): khrid de glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song nas rngon pa de la yang grong khyer mchog cig byin no/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir dong nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga'
210b5('dul ba): mgur spyod par byed de yid 'phrog ma'i gzugs dang na tshod dang bsnyen bkur brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar phrogs so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
210b6('dul ba): zhig na bram ze gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'ongs pa las de las gcig ni rgyal po la rten bcas so/ /gnyis pa ni gzhon nu nor bzangs la'o/ /rgyal po la rten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal pos mdun
210b7('dul ba): na 'don du bcug ste longs spyod kyi skal ba yang byin no/ /gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi gang yin pa de la ni des longs spyod kyi skal ba tsam zhig byin pa dang / smras pa/ gzhon nu gang gi tshe yab 'das nas khyod
210b8('dul ba): rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe bdag la ci zhig bgyi/ gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod kyi grogs po bram ze nga'i yab kyi mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du khyod kyang nga'i
211a1('dul ba): mdun na 'don du gzhug go zhes byas pa'i gtam de gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis kyang rgyal srid mi 'thob pa de ltar bya na mdun na 'don du
211a2('dul ba): gzhug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po de'i yul du ri 'or ba zhig sdo bar gyur nas rgyal pos de 'bebs su dmag kha chen cig btang ba las de bcom/ rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar log
211a3('dul ba): go/ /de bzhin du kha chen bdun gyi bar btang ba las de rnams kyang bcom/ rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar lhags so/ /rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha ci'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu skyed par
211a4('dul ba): mdzad/ gang yang lha'i yul na mtshon gyis 'tsho ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gsol/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/ gzhon nu bsad pa'i thabs bya ba'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas des rgyal po la gsol pa/
211a5('dul ba): lha de lta bus ni dbab par rngo mi thog go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar bya nga nyid kho na 'gro 'am/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ ci'i slad du lha nyid gshegs/ gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di ni dar la bab cing mthu rtsal snyems pa dang
211a6('dul ba): ldan pa lags pas dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas bsgo ba/ gzhon nu dmag dang lhan cig tu deng la ri 'or ba rnams phob shig /
211a7('dul ba): lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas/ btsun mo rnams kyi gan du song ste yid 'phrog ma mthong ba dang de thams cad brjed par gyur to/ /de nas yang rgyal pos bsgo ba dang yang mthong ma thag tu
211a8('dul ba): thams cad brjed par gyur to/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gzhon nu nor bzangs ni yid 'phrog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi rngo mi thog gis/ dmag sdogs la gzhon nu btsun mo rnams kyi nang
211b1('dul ba): nas byung ba dang ci nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung du mi mchi bar thal byung gtang bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs sta gon gyis shig /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan
211b2('dul ba): nas dpung gi tshogs glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung phun sum tshogs pa 'tshog chas go mtshon rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta gon byas so/ /de nas gzhon nu phyir byung ba dang bsgo ba/ gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs sta
211b3('dul ba): gon byas kyis song shig / des smras pa/ lha yid 'phrog ma la bltas te mchi bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu thogs par 'gyur gyis ma lta shig /yab gal te de lta na ma la bltas te mchi'o/ /gzhon nu ma
211b4('dul ba): la ni ltos shig / des yid 'phrog ma'i gtsug gi nor bu khyer nas ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yum bdag ri 'or ba rnams 'bebs su mchi lags kyis/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di khyod kyis shin tu
211b5('dul ba): d ben par sbos la yid 'phrog ma 'gum pa la thug pa ma lags pa ji ltar gyur kyang ma stsal cig ces des de skad ma la bsgo nas mchi phyag byas te dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis
211b6('dul ba): yul 'das nas ri 'or de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa shig gi drung du btab ste 'dug go/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin stong
211b7('dul ba): phrag du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lam de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi 'dun sar chas so/ /de lam de nas chas pa na nam mkha'i lam la thogs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
211b8('dul ba): lam 'di nas lan mang po zhig tu song na bdag gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur na gang gis na da ltar thogs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod snyam pa las/ des gzhon nu nor bzangs mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te 'di ni bskal pa
212a1('dul ba): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ dmag la chas pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i grogs byas te ri 'or ba 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab bo snyam du bsams nas/ gnod sbyin gyi
212a2('dul ba): sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa/ lnga len tshur shog /khyod kyis gzhon nu nor bzangs ri 'or ba rnams dang g.yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par ma bya bar phob shig /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis bka' bzhin
212a3('dul ba): 'tshal zhes rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas lha'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa shing ta la'i tshad tsam gyi skyes pa dang / ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang / glang po che'i tshad tsam gyi rta dang / gzhal med khang gi tshad tsam gyi shing rta rnams
212a4('dul ba): sprul to/ /de nas ral gri dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung thung dang / mda' dang / dgra sta la sogs te mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs
212a5('dul ba): pa chen po ston cing / lnga len mthu chen po'i tshogs rnams dang ri 'or du phyin pa dang / glang po che dang rta dang shing rta'i sgra dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra sna tshogs dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang gi mthus ra ba dag ral bar gyur to/ /de nas ri 'or na gnas pa de rnams
212a6('dul ba): kyis dpung gi tshogs de dang ra ba dag ral ba mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te dris pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ myur du sgo phye shig /gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di'i mjug nas 'ong ste dpung gi tshogs 'di ni
212a7('dul ba): de'i yin no/ /gal te myur du ma phye na thams cad rmeg med par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis bdag cag rgyal la mi ldog ste/ /gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min/ /rgyal po zho shas 'tsho rnams kyis/ /bdag cag 'jigs shing skrag gyur mod/ /ces smras nas
212a8('dul ba): de rnams kyis sgo phye ste/ de nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas bum pa gang ba dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu nor bzangs bsu'o/ /des kyang dbugs phyung nas de rnams 'drang ba las sna bo bskos te dpya thang bcad/ gte'u yang bzung ngo / /
212b1('dul ba): de nas ri 'or ba de rnams cham du phab nas gzhon nu nor bzangs slar log go/ /rgyal po nor can gyis de nyid kyi nub mo'i rmi lam na bya rgod cig 'ongs te rgyal po'i lto dral nas rgyu ma gzangs te grong khyer de thams cad kyi mtha' bskor ba dang rin po che sna
212b2('dul ba): bdun khyim du 'ongs par mthong ngo / /mthong nas de nas rgyal po 'jigs skrag mi dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed nas myur ba myur bar langs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa
212b3('dul ba): 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las de nam nangs nas rmi lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ lha rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba ni gdon mi za bar gzhon nus ri 'or pa
212b4('dul ba): rnams pham par byas kyis log pa zhig tu bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa/ lha khyod kyis rmi lam du gzigs pa ni bzang ba ma lags te/ gdon ma 'tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ sku tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur
212b5('dul ba): lags so/ /'on kyang 'di bzlog pa'i thabs mchis te/ de yang bram ze rnams kyis gsang tshig las mthong ngo / /bzlog pa'i thabs de ci yin/ lha bskyed mos tshal du rdzing dbyibs legs pa tshad la bab pa bgyis la/ de nas rdo thal gyis
212b6('dul ba): byugs te/ legs par bstar la ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la de nas lhas khrus la gshegs pa na rdzing de la them skas gcig las 'jug par bgyi'o/ /gcig las zhugs nas gnyis pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /gnyis pa las
212b7('dul ba): zhugs nas gsum pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /gsum pa las zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs lces bldags la mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyi
212b8('dul ba): bdug pas bdug go/ /de ltar na lha'i dngos sdig 'byang zhing yun ring por rgyal srid skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de dag thams cad ni nus na 'di ltar mi ma yin pa'i tshil 'di ni shin tu dkon no/ /mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha mod pa gang lags pa de
213a1('dul ba): dkon lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de ji lta bu zhig yin/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha yid 'phrog ma 'di mi ma lags pa ma lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ mdun na 'don 'di la gzhon nu'i srog 'dug gis de skad ma smra shig /
213a2('dul ba): des smras pa/ lha khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' gtang ste/ /grong rdal phyir ni khyim gtang ngo / /yul ljongs phyir ni grong rdal te/ /bdag gi phyir ni sa gtang ngo / /zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam/ rgyal po bdag nyid brtan gyur nas/ /gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni/ /
213a3('dul ba): gzhan zhig stsal bar spyod grang gis/ /yid 'phrog 'di ni dgum par mdzod/ /bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa ni mi byed pa ci yang med pas des khas blangs so/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya bar brtsams te/
213a4('dul ba): rdzing brkos nas rdo thal gyis byugs shing legs par bstar nas ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag sogs pa la zhugs so/ /sbyor ba de nor bzangs kyi btsun mo'i skye bos shes nas de rnams dga' ba dang yid bde skyes te/ bdag cag
213a5('dul ba): lang tsho la bab cing gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ da ni bdag cag dang gzhon nu nor bzangs su yongs su dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag yid 'phrog mas mthong nas dris pa/
213a6('dul ba): khyed cag ci'i phyir lhag par dga'/ ji tsam na gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog ma la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi ma gang na ba der song ste rkang pa
213a7('dul ba): gnyis la gtugs nas snying rje rje skad du sgra bcom chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te de lta na legs par rtogs shig /bdag gis kyang brtag go/ /yid 'phrog mas brtags nas yang smras pa dang / des brtags
213a8('dul ba): na yang bden par mthong nas de nas des gtsug gi nor bu de dang gos shig yid 'phrog ma la byin nas smras pa/ bu khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro shig /de lta na kho mo la kha mchu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin
213b1('dul ba): du khrus la chas te khrag gis gang ba'i rdzing bur zhugs nas byung ba dang / de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la bram ze rnams kyi lces bldags so/ /ji tsam na mi 'am ci mo khrid de shog ces bsgo ba dang / de ma thag kho nar yid 'phrog ma nam mkha'
213b2('dul ba): la 'phags te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni reg dang phrad pa dang / /bdag ni bgad dang rtses pa las/ /ban glang mo btags thar pa ltar/ /de ni bdag mo 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal pos kyang nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba mthong nas de skrag
213b3('dul ba): ste mdun na 'don la smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'bad par bya ba de ma grub par mi 'am ci yid 'phrog ma bros so/ /mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha da ni don grub ste dngos sdig dang bral lags so/ /de nas yid 'phrog ma nam mkha'i lam las
213b4('dul ba): 'gro ba na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yang bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni drang srong des bstan pa las gyur gyi/ gal te des ma bstan na ni bdag bzung zhing 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba zhig /de lta bas na re shig drang srong de'i drung du 'gro'o snyam nas/
213b5('dul ba): de de'i bsti gnas su song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas drang srong la smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas bdag bzung ste mchis nas mi'i reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar chad du cung zhig gis ma gyur to/ /de bas gsol
213b6('dul ba): ba ni gal te brgya zhig la gzhon nu nor bzangs bdag tshol zhing mchis na de la bdag gi sor gdub stsol la 'di skad kyang gsung ba'i rigs so/ /gzhon nu lam yang bgrod par dka' ste nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar bzhud cig /gal te
213b7('dul ba): bzlog kyang mchis su ma btub na de la lam bstan pa'i rigs kyis/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog mas bstan pa byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis so/ /de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mo/ /de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang
213b8('dul ba): gsum mchis so/ /de dag rgal ba dang ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so/ /de'i byang phyogs na ni ri bo phur pa'i rtse mchis so/ /de nas lam chu sgra can dang / seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i
214a1('dul ba): gzugs can dang / phur pa'i dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rab grol te/ ri bo de dag khyod kyis rgol cig /de la ri bo seng sdeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i dbyibs la ni phug nas 'jug /
214a2('dul ba): rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/ thabs 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams rgal bar bgyi'o/ /'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o/ /
214a3('dul ba): phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni zho shas gzhom par bgyi'o/ /gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig /phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi slad du gzhu rdungs la/ /
214a4('dul ba): mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis/ /gang nas lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ /rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni/ /de gnyis rwa re bcag mdzod dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /'jigs pa che bskyed mtshon thogs pa'i/ /
214a5('dul ba): lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/ /de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig /kha 'dzums gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/ /de tshe de yi 'phral ba la/
214a6('dul ba): phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/ /de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil/ /drug bcu'i khru can la khyod mchongs/ /skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing / /mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag /
214a7('dul ba): gzhu bkang ste ni gsang mdzod la/ /chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi/ /chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig /nang ga phye ma lab gdungs dang / /sna tshogs ngud mo dgod pa dang / /sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung / /nang ga na ni srin mo khro/ /phye ma
214a8('dul ba): leb na mi ma yin/ /gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang / sna tshogs can na 'dod sgyur gzugs/ /ngud mor mi 'am ci yi bran/ /dgod pa na ni mi 'am ci'o/ /mna' ma sbrul can sbrul mang na/ /'od ma can klung shal ma li/ /nang ga la
214b1('dul ba): ni brtan par bya/ /phye ma lab la rtul phod bya/ gdungs par 'dzin khri kha cing ngo / /sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/ /ngud mo can du yid bde bas/ /dgod byed du mi smra ba yi/ /sbyor bas kun du rgal bar mdzod/ /sbrul can du ni sbrul
214b2('dul ba): dug gi/ /sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/ /klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi/ /sbyor bas kun du rgal bar mdzod/ /chu bo rnams rgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te gzhom par mdzod cig /
214b3('dul ba): de nas ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so zhes gsungs shig /drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas de skad ces smras nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te de nas song ngo / /ji tsam na gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ri 'or de phab nas skyes khyer
214b4('dul ba): te glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs so zhes rgyal pos thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /de nas gzhon nu ngal sos nas pha'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas
214b5('dul ba): smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod bde bar 'ongs sam/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin gyis ri 'or ba phab ste gte'u bzung sna bo bskos lags te/ dpya dang skyes kyang 'di dag lags kyis phyag mdzod du gzhug tu gsol/ /rgyal pos smras
214b6('dul ba): pa/ bu legs par byas kyis bzhes so/ /de nas gzhon nus pha la phyag byas nas chas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu skyes la lhan cig kho nar longs spyad kyis 'dug shig /lha bdag gis yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas
214b7('dul ba): yun ring zhig lags pas mchi lags so/ /gzhon nu deng 'gro ba shol la sang song shig /de gal gyis 'chu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab nges par deng nyid bdag mchi lags so/ /rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /
214b8('dul ba): de nas gzhon nu rang gi khyim du song na btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dpal gyis stong par mthong nas de sems khongs su chud bzhin du zhugs na/ yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas snying stor te phan tshun du rgyu zhing yid 'phrog ma yid 'phrog
215a1('dul ba): ma zhes sgra phyung ngo / /ji tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas btsun mo de rnams kyis gtam rlung la bskur ba dang / de'i snying la zug rngus zug pas yang nas yang du dris pa las/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /
215a2('dul ba): de mya ngan gyis yid blong bar gyur to/ /bud med de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas bud med shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ des pha snying rje med cing byas pa chud
215a3('dul ba): gson pa thos nas ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/ yum yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cing / /gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog gang du mchis/ /
215a4('dul ba): yid kyis rab tu brgyug snyam na 'ang / /bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs/ /de dang bral bar gyur pa yis/ /snying ni shin tu gdungs pa nyid/ /bdag gi yid du mchi zhing yid 'phrog la/ /yid du 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi/ /yid 'phrog
215a5('dul ba): dang bral bdag lus gdungs pa yi/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas mchis/ /des smras pa/ bu yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo / /yum ji ltar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur
215a6('dul ba): pa thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / des pha snying rje med cing byas pa mi gzo ba yin no zhes smras nas yang smras pa/ yum gang du mchis/ shul ni gang nas/ des smras pa/ gang du yid 'phrog song ba yi/ /lam de ri dang drang srong
215a7('dul ba): dang / /seng ge dag gis rtag bsten cing / /chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin/ /de yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi bzad par nyam thag cing snying rje rje skad du bla zhing smre sngags 'don pa/ yid bzhin yon tan ldan
215a8('dul ba): gyur pa'i/ /yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/ /zhes bya ba nas bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'ongs zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas mas smras pa/ bu btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i
215b1('dul ba): bud med dag yod na ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/ gzhon nus smras pa/ yum de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/ des de dbugs phyung yang 'on kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs nas de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams te de'i blo skyes
215b2('dul ba): pa/ gang kho na las thob pa de nyid la re shig dri'o snyam nas/ des rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song ste dris pa/ khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas rnyed/ des smras pa/ ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong zhig gnas te/ de'i bsti gnas
215b3('dul ba): na tshangs pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te/ der khrus la zhugs pa las drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do/ /des bsams pa/ da ni drang srong gi drung du song dang de las khungs phyin par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /rgyal pos gzhon nu yid
215b4('dul ba): 'phrog ma dang bral bas shin tu yid blong ba'i gtam de thos so/ /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod yid blong du ci yod/ da ni de bas khyad par 'phags pa'i chung ma sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ yab bdag ni de ma lags pa'i mchis brang
215b5('dul ba): gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thog lags so/ /rgyal pos de la lan du ma smras kyang ma zlogs so/ /de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang ra ba'i khar ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu srungs ma dag bkod
215b6('dul ba): do/ /de nas gzhon nu ni mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to/ /lnga po 'di dag ni mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi phal cher mi nyal te/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa bud med la chags pas sems bcings pa dang / bud med skyes pa
215b7('dul ba): la chags pa dang / srog chags ngur pa dang / chom rkun pa'i ra bgo dang / dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gzhon nu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag sgo nas song na rgyal po'i
215b8('dul ba): sgo srungs kyi srung ma gtum po dag yod de/ de rnams kyis bdag chad pas gcod pa 'am/ srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang ma la bdag srung ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro'o snyam nas/ de
216a1('dul ba): mtshan mo langs te ut+pa la sngon po'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa'i phreng ba rgyal mtshan la btags nas gang na srungs ma'i mi med pa de nas babs pa na zla ba shar to/ /de nas des zla ba la bltas nas yid
216a2('dul ba): 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu dag 'don par byed de/ zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal byed kye/ /khyod ni snar ma'i mig tu sdug pa ded dpon bzang / /ci ga bdag gi sdug pa ut+pal lta bu'i
216a3('dul ba): mig / yid 'phrog ces bgyi khyod kyis sa stengs gzigs lags sam/ /zhes smras nas/ sngon gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba dran zhing song ba las ri dgas mo zhig mthong nas de la yang smras pa/ kye ma ri dgas
216a4('dul ba): mo khyod rtswa chu lo ma za/ /khyod ni legs gyur bder spyod bdag ni rngon pa min/ /ri dgas mo ltar mig dkyus ring bas gzugs bzang ba/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /de nas song ste phyogs
216a5('dul ba): gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / tshal me tog dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs spyod pa mthong nas de nas bung ba zhig la smras pa/ sbrang rtsi'i bung ba ri bo mthon ting lta bu'i mchog /smyug ma'i
216a6('dul ba): sbubs dang pad ma dag la gnas 'cha' ba/ /skra yi tshogs ring kha dog bung ba ltar gnag pa/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang sbrul shig mthong ngo / /mthong nas
216a7('dul ba): kyang smras pa/ kye ma'o sbrul gnag shing lo lta bur lce g.yo zhing / /mig dang kha yi nang nas dud pa'i tshogs 'byin pa/ /khyod kyi gdug pa'i me dang 'dod chags mer mi mtshungs/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis
216a8('dul ba): mthong gyur tam/ /de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu son pa dang / tshal gzhan zhig na khu byug sgra 'byin pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khu byug de la yang smras pa/ kye ma khu byug tshal mchog ljon shing la gnas pa/ /'dab
216b1('dul ba): chags tshogs kyi rgyal po bud med yid 'phrog pa/ /ut+pal sngon po lta bur dri med mdzes pa'i mig /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang / shing mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba me tog
216b2('dul ba): thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong nas/ ming gi rnam grangs bkra shis zhes brjod pa/ /ljon pa rnams kyi rgyal po cher gyur la/ /yid 'phrog mya ngan gyis ni blong ba dag /thal mo sbyor na khyod kyis mya ngan songs/ /de de ltar yid blong
216b3('dul ba): bzhin rim gyis drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin nas des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas smras pa/ bzod 'phags gos su shing shun dang ni g.yang gzhi mnabs/ /rtswa ba myu gu skyu ru bil ba ka pid
216b4('dul ba): gsol/ /drang srong mgos btud phyag 'tshal bdag gi yid 'phrog ma/ /khyod kyis gzigs sam khyod ni bdag la myur du gsungs/ /de nas drang srong des gzhon nu nor bzangs la byon pa legs so zhes byas pa dang / stan
216b5('dul ba): bting ba bya ba la sogs pa sngar bya ba'i yang dag par dga' ba byas nas smras pa/ smin ma 'jam pa'i smin mtshungs mthon mthing bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ /bzhin ras zla ba nya 'dra ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i mig de
216b6('dul ba): bdag gis mthong / /dpon khyod bag rkyang bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna tshogs gsol bar mdzod cig dang / /slad kyis bde blag byon 'gyur 'di la bdag gi yid la the tshom yong ma mchis/ /smin ma bzang mos 'di skad tshig
216b7('dul ba): smras te/ /gzhon nu khyod la sred pas bdag mi bde/ /nags khrod gnas pa'ang sdug bsngal chen po ste/ /gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag mthong ngo / /des sor gdub rgyan 'di byin nas smras pa/ lam ya nga la bgrod dka'
216b8('dul ba): bas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar log shig / gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tu ma btub na de la lam bstan pa'i rigs so/ /des yang 'di skad ces bstan te/ byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum yod do/ /de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na
217a1('dul ba): yang gsum/ de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum yod de/ de dag rgal ba dang ri'i rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba yod de/ phyogs de nas sman 'di dag blang bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste shin tu 'o ma 'dzag ces bya ba'i sman
217a2('dul ba): yod de/ de mar las btsos nas btung bar bya'o/ /des na skom pa dang bkres pa med cing dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /spre'u shig kyang bkri bar bya/ gsang sngags kyang bslab par bya/ gzhu
217a3('dul ba): mda' dang chas pa dang / nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang / dug gsod pa sman dug sel dang / lcags kyi phur pa gsum dang / pi bang yang bcang bar bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na ri bo phur
217a4('dul ba): pa'i rtse yod do/ /de nas lam chu sgra can dang / seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang / phur pa'i dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang /
217a5('dul ba): mi g.yo ba dang / rab grol lo/ /khyod kyis ri de dag rgal dgos te/ de la ri bo seng ldeng can la ni phug nas 'jug /rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i dbyibs la yang phug nas 'jug rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos
217a6('dul ba): 'jug ste/ thabs 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams rgal bar bya'o/ /'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag gzhom par bya'o/ /phug na sbrul kha chu'i
217a7('dul ba): rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni zho shas gzhom par bya'o/ /gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig /phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi slad du gzhu bdungs la/ mda' yis bsnun
217a8('dul ba): te bsad par gyis/ /gang la lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ /rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni/ /de gnyis rwa re bcag mdzod dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /'jigs pa che skyed mtshon thogs pa'i/ /lcags kyi
217b1('dul ba): skyes pa gnyis mthong na/ /de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig /kha 'dzums gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/ /de tshe de yi 'phral ba
217b2('dul ba): la/ /phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/ /de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil/ /drug bcu'i khru can la khyod mchongs/ /skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing / /mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po
217b3('dul ba): dag / gzhu bkang ste ni gsang mdzod la/ /chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi/ /chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig /nang ga phye ma lab gdungs dang / /sna tshogs ngud mo dgod pa dang / /sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung / /nang ga na ni
217b4('dul ba): srin mo khro/ /phye ma lab na mi ma yin/ /gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang / /sna tshogs can na 'dod sgyur gzugs/ /ngud mor mi 'am ci yi bran/ /dgod pa na ni mi 'am ci'i/ /mna' ma sbrul can sbrul mang na/ /
217b5('dul ba): 'od ma can klung shal ma li/ /nang ga na ni brtan par bya/ /phye ma leb la rtul phod bya/ /gdungs par 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo / /sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/ /ngud mo can du yid bde bas/ /dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i/ /sbyor
217b6('dul ba): bas kun du rgal bar mdzod/ /sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi/ /sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/ /klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi/ /sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ /chu bo rnams rgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin
217b7('dul ba): lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te gzhom par mdzod cig / de nas ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so zhes gsungs shig /de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ji skad bstan pa'i sman dang / gsang sngags
217b8('dul ba): dang / sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo / /de nas des spre'u ma gtogs par ji skad bstan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas/ de nas de rnams khyer te yang drang srong de'i
218a1('dul ba): drung du song ba dang / des de la spre'u byin nas smras pa/ gzhon nu 'bad pa 'dis ci bya/ yid 'phrog ma ni ci dgos/ khyod gcig pu grogs med pa lus gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyis thong / gzhon nus smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag ni
218a2('dul ba): gdon mi za bar mchi'o/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ mkha' la zla ba rgyu ba grogs shig ga las mchis/ /mche ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i ri dgas gtso bo dang / /me yis nags sreg pa na grogs shig ga las mchis/ /bdag
218a3('dul ba): lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal/ /kye ci rgya mtsho che chur 'jug par mi bgyi 'am/ /ci lags sbrul gyis zin ces gso bar mi bgyi 'am/ /sems can spungs can gyis bsten brtson 'grus cher brtsams
218a4('dul ba): te/ /gal te 'bad de ma rung 'di la nyes pa med/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs yid 'phrog mas bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis ri dang / chu bo dang / phug dang g.yang sa la sogs par sman dang / gsang
218a5('dul ba): sngags dang / sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang / gzhon nus grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa bskyed mos tshal gyi tshal me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs
218a6('dul ba): dang ldan pas mdzes par byas pa/ bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/ rdzing bu dang / mtshe'u ring po dang / gru bzhi dang / mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la mi'am ci mo rnams chu len du 'ongs pa mthong nas/ des gzhon
218a7('dul ba): nu nor bzangs kyis de rnams la smras pa/ chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis/ de mi'i lag tu son par gyur pas de'i mi'i dri bshal
218a8('dul ba): ba lags so/ /gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis dris pa/ ci bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de'i steng nas ldugs sam/ 'on te rim gyis/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rim gyis so/ /des bsams pa/ thabs
218b1('dul ba): 'di bzang ste/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'di bum pa gcig gi nang du gzhug go snyam nas/ des mi'am ci mo gcig gi bum par ma tshor bar bcug nas mi'am ci mo de la smras pa/ khyod kyi bum pa 'dis thog mar yid 'phrog ma la khrus
218b2('dul ba): byos shig / des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas des bum pa de thog mar yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor blugs pa las ji tsam na sor gdub kyi rgya pang du lhung ba dang yid 'phrog
218b3('dul ba): mas de 'phrigs so/ /de nas mi'am ci mo la dris pa/ 'dir mi 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs sam/ des smras pa/ mchis so/ /song la de dben pa zhig tu zhog shig /des de nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/ /de nas yid
218b4('dul ba): 'phrog mas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab gal te bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa gzhon nu nor bzangs de mchis na de la khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ des smras pa/ de mi yin te cir yang mi mkho bas ngas de dum
218b5('dul ba): bu brgyar byas la phyogs bzhir gtor te gtang ngo / /yid 'phrog mas smras pa/ yab mir gyur pas 'dir ga la mchi/ bdag nyid de skad mchi bar bas so/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa kun nas dkris pa dang bral
218b6('dul ba): te/ de nas kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/ gal te gzhon nu de 'ongs na ngas khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la nor dang yo byad mang po dang / mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no/ /
218b7('dul ba): de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas gzhon nu nor bzangs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gzhon nu nor bzangs
218b8('dul ba): gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de nas de bgam par 'dod nas gser gyi sdong po bdun dang / shing ta la bdun dang /
219a1('dul ba): rnga bo che bdun dang / phag bdun btsugs so/ /gzhon nu nor bzangs ni byang chub sems dpa' yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin no/ /
219a2('dul ba): lha rnams kyang de dag la bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang / glu dang pi bang dang / kharnga dang / shin tu sgra snyan dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa lha rnams kyis
219a3('dul ba): bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni kun nas 'bud cing mi 'am ci stong phrag du mas ni yongs su bskor nas/ ral gri ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba thogs te/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa
219a4('dul ba): mthong bar gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas chu shing la gcod pa bzhin du sdong po de dum bu dum bur gcad par brtsams te/ de nas de til gyi 'bru tsam du brlags so/ /mdas ni shing rta la bdun dang / rnga bdun dang / phag bdun
219a5('dul ba): gtsang mar phyung ste/ ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo bar gnas so/ /de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi 'am ci brgya stong phrag du mas a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po phyung ngo / /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
219a6('dul ba): ljon pas mthong zhing thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /de nas mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma bzhag ste/ gzhon nu nor bzangs la smras pa/ gzhon nu tshur yid 'phrog
219a7('dul ba): ma ngo shes par gyis shig / de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la/ /kho bo'i sdug pa yid 'phrog yin zhe na/ /bden pa
219a8('dul ba): 'di yis myur ba kho nar ni/ /yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog /de nas de ma thag tu gom pas song ba dang / mi 'am ci rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa
219b1('dul ba): shin du tshogs pa lags te/ yid 'phrog ma dang thab rir bab lags na/ ci'i slad du 'di la tho btsam/ 'di la yid 'phrog ma stsol cig /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams kyis
219b2('dul ba): rjes su bsngags pa dang / mi 'am ci rnams kyi 'dun pas gzhon nu nor bzangs la rje bkur sti chen po byas nas yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung / gser gyi bya ma bum
219b3('dul ba): lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma 'di mi 'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ kho bos khyod kyi chung ma'i phyir byin gyis/ mi rnams ni ngo mi
219b4('dul ba): rtag pa yin gyis/ ji ltar yang 'di ma dor cig /yab bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyan nas mi 'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig
219b5('dul ba): skyes pa med par sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur nas yid 'phrog
219b6('dul ba): ma la smras pa pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis non par gyur to/ /de nas yid 'phrog mas de ltar gyur pa dag pha la rgyas par smras so/ /des smras pa/ gzhon nu dang lhan cig song la mi rnams ni slu bar byed pa yin gyis/
219b7('dul ba): khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te btang nas de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha'i lam la mi 'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na rim
219b8('dul ba): gyis glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin no/ /de nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dar gyi chun 'phyang dpyangs rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan btsugs/ shin tu dri zhim
220a1('dul ba): po'i pog por dag bshams/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste/ dga' dga' ltar byas so/ /de nas gzhon nu mi'i gtso bo stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer
220a2('dul ba): du zhugs so/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag khyer te pha'i drung du song nas rgyal po'i stan gyi glo zhig tu 'dug ste/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba dang 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras so/ /
220a3('dul ba): de nas rgyal po nor can gyis 'di ni shin du stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa can no zhes bya bar rig nas rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/ /gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis bsams pa/ gang bdag yid 'phrog ma dang
220a4('dul ba): lhan cig tshogs pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin gyis/ ma la de yang bdag gis sbyin pa dag ni btang / bsod nams dag ni bya'o snyam nas/ des glang po'i khyim gyi grong
220a5('dul ba): khyer du lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu nor bzangs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub
220a6('dul ba): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rgyal po nor bzangs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ngas gang yid 'phrog ma'i phyir stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa bstan nas/ lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa
220a7('dul ba): des ngas bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de dang / brtson 'grus de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam yin no// // rgyal po chen po gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa
220a8('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer na rgyal po
220b1('dul ba): thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi ba zhes
220b2('dul ba): bya ba nas/ chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
220b3('dul ba): mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar
220b4('dul ba): 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ 'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'jar ba/ sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas/ gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/
220b5('dul ba): bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu rnams la byams pa/ thams cad sbyin pa/ thams cad gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong ba/ gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no/ /
220b6('dul ba): de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos nas dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ongs te thams cad kyang yid la re ba rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo / /de nas re shig cig na byang chub sems dpas shing rta nor bu dang gser dang dngul dang /
220b7('dul ba): rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang / spug dang / pad ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI las 'bar bar byas pa/ tsan dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/ seng ge dang stag dang gung gi lpags pas g.yogs pa/ rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa/ gser
220b8('dul ba): dang dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas grong khyer dam pa nas bskyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo / /de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad
221a1('dul ba): sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /yang smras pa/ khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ /thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di/ /
221a2('dul ba): khyod kyis sbyin pa gtang ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te snying dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta byin
221a3('dul ba): nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa
221a4('dul ba): drug pa/ de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba me tog kun da dang / ku mu da dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gnas shing rkang lag legs par gnas pa/
221a5('dul ba): glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/ mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang / mdza' bshes dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla
221a6('dul ba): ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du sos ka'i dus la bab pas shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i
221a7('dul ba): nags tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang / de nas phyir rgol bas sbad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig ces
221a8('dul ba): smras nas yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ /khyod kyi glang po'i mchog 'di ni/ /bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i
221b1('dul ba): mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po'i mchog de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang / /de bzhin bdag
221b2('dul ba): gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyis khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas sbad pa'i bram ze rnams
221b3('dul ba): la byin no zhes thos so/ /thos nas rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin du khros 'khrugs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug ste/ gzhon nu khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song shig /de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas
221b4('dul ba): spangs pa dang / bsams pa/ bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad par byas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas glang po che de yang btang ste/ de bas khyim na gnas pas ni/ /ci
221b5('dul ba): nus par ni sbyin pa btang / /dka' thub nags su brten nas ni/ /nges par mchog dag bya ba yin/ /bslangs na mi sbyin zhes bya ba/ /tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyis/ /de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te/ /dka' thub nags su rab tu 'gro/ /
221b6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste de dag rgyas par smras so/ /de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te/
221b7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te de lta na bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nags gnas su mchi ste/ bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam mkha' zla bas
221b8('dul ba): stongs par gyur pa dang / /ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang / /pad ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa dag /bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni
222a1('dul ba): 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /khyod ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus shin tu skyid pa yin dka' thub kyi nags na ni rtswa dang lo ma bting bar ni nyal rtsa ba dang / me tog dang /
222a2('dul ba): 'bras bu ni za/ rtswa dur ba dang / zug rdo dang / rtswa dang / tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu/ yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni brten/ bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni bsten dgos/ glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad
222a3('dul ba): dgos la/ de na yang nga gdon mi za bar ci nus kyi sbyin pa gtong ste/ de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so/ /de bas na re shig da dung yang legs par soms shig /rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ rje'i
222a4('dul ba): sras bdag rngo ci thog gis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de khyod kyis dran par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag
222a5('dul ba): byas te/ yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal/ /nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchi lags kyis/ /mi yi dbang po'i phyag mdzod stongs mi 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po
222a6('dul ba): bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis brnangs te skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/ bu sbyin pa'i blo 'or la 'dug shig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par yang / /gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yang / /
222a7('dul ba): sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las/ /sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas song ngo / /de nas bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/ grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul
222a8('dul ba): mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin song ngo / /de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas mi zhig la dris pa/ kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po cho nges
222b1('dul ba): 'debs pa 'di ci las gyur/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci mi shes sam/ 'di ltar mi yi dbang pos nyid kyi sras po mche ba bzang / /brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di ni spyugs/ /de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags
222b2('dul ba): mthar chas pa la/ /pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan
222b3('dul ba): dag slar deng shig slar deng shig / 'di ltar shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/ gnyen pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas
222b4('dul ba): kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med de/ /mdza' ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur bsams nas/ /khyod kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /
222b5('dul ba): zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan par gyis/ /de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas
222b6('dul ba): dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/ khyod kyis shing rta mchog 'di bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas tshig brlangs pos bram ze de la smras
222b7('dul ba): pa/ e ma'o nags na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang / /bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo/ /mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/ /'di la 'dir ni snying rje cig mi skye 'am/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod
222b8('dul ba): kyis bram ze ma spyo shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/ /kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob/ /sbyin stsogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa'
223a1('dul ba): rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas yang rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze ser sna'i dri ma sel byed pa/ /shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di
223a2('dul ba): yis 'dir/ /bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i/ /zag med chos kyi shing rta che skor shog /de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu nag po phrag pa la khyer/
223a3('dul ba): rgyags sbyin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang rim gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to/ /de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so/ /
223a4('dul ba): ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang / bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas/ /spa
223a5('dul ba): shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/ /de yi don du bus pa gnyis/ /khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa gtong ba la cung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang /
223a6('dul ba): de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na 'di ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/ khyed ni kun ster snying
223a7('dul ba): rje yi/ /bdag nyid can du sa stengs grags/ /ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze de la smras pa/ kye bram ze
223a8('dul ba): chen po/ rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang / /lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na/ /rang gi bu ni btang ba la/ /bdag blo gzhan du gyur ci smos/ /bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/ bdag gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i/ /bus pa 'di gnyis
223b1('dul ba): yongs spangs nas/ /ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/ /gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas/ /bus pa btang la bdag min zhes/ /kha cig bdag la phyar 'ong gis/ /bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/ /de nas
223b2('dul ba): bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang /
223b3('dul ba): mchod pa dang / bkur stis spos kyi glang po che lta bu/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa/ skye bo bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mgon med pa dang / ltogs pa yongs su sdud pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs su
223b4('dul ba): rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/ lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa 'am/ mthong ba don med pa 'am/ re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par
223b5('dul ba): bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/ khyod kyi med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtang ba'i
223b6('dul ba): rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ /ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ /grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la bcal byas kyang / /mche bzang
223b7('dul ba): khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas bu la chags pa'i blong bas 'di dag sems par byed de gal te re shig bu gnyis po/ /bram zer
223b8('dul ba): byin na bu dang ni/ /bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag /bdag dang rgyags byin gyis thob 'gyur/ /'on kyang 'di la ma byin na/ /brtul zhugs las kyang nyams 'gyur zhing / /bram ze 'di ni tshi bcad de/ /ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro/ /
224a1('dul ba): nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i/ /mya ngan sa steng bdag gis blang / /de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa/ /zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis sdug pa'i bu
224a2('dul ba): gnyis nges par gtang bar chad nas smras pa/ kye kho bos dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi/ /rgya mtsho chen po so sor 'jigs byed pa/ /gting mi dpogs par rab tu bying ba dag /pha rol rgal phyir lam gyi zam
224a3('dul ba): stegs bca'/ /zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can/ /ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/ /mchi ma rlan chus mig ni gang gyur pa'i/ /byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin/ /yang smras pa/ bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /
224a4('dul ba): rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas/ /des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya/ /bus pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas sa g.yos pa des tshal de na
224a5('dul ba): gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams sngangs nas phan tshun smras pa/ sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa/ /'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin/ /gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba/ /shin tu gsal bar shes par bya/ /de na gnas 'jog dang rus
224a6('dul ba): gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/ gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du 'ong ba/
224a7('dul ba): mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir spangs te/ des na sa g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i
224a8('dul ba): blo rig nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab cig yum ni ma mchis par/ /khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa/ /re shig de ni mthong gyur nas/ /de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol/ /
224b1('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngo zum gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu dag /nga yi snying du mi sdug min/ /snying brtse snying rje med min te/ /'jig rten kun la phan
224b2('dul ba): pa'i phyir/ /yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin/ /ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog /zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i/ /rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis
224b3('dul ba): phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang / sma bab pa'i tshig gis dal gyis smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na/ /ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi phrin/ /
224b4('dul ba): khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces/ /yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol/ yab gzhan yang byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang / /gal te la lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am/ /gus par
224b5('dul ba): mnyan nas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa/ /de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ /de skad ces smras nas pha la phyag 'tshal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bla ma
224b6('dul ba): la smra bar yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab
224b7('dul ba): ste dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so/ /byis pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la ca co dang / ga zha'i
224b8('dul ba): sgra 'byin cing / e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che/ /bus pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang / /gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa/ /de yi nges pa rmad cig go/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas logs su chas pa las sa che thang du
225a1('dul ba): g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang / lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thar bar bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad
225a2('dul ba): byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang / rgyags sbyin mas ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/ ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/ /kho mo'i 'di bkag nas ni ci
225a3('dul ba): ste 'dug / ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo nges she na/ /lam las bzur ste myur du 'gro bar gyis/ /gzhan yang khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la/ /bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/ /btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyis/ /ri dgas
225a4('dul ba): rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye shig / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha seng ge'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo / /de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas yud tsam zhig bsams pa/
225a5('dul ba): ji ltar bar snang la ngud mo'i sgra grag pa dang / ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i lha rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grag pa las na gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul
225a6('dul ba): ba dang / /ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang / /ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las/ /bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/ /ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa las/ /bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang / /ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las/ /bus pa de gnyis btang
225a7('dul ba): bar nges/ /zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te mi dga' bzhin bltas na bu gnyis ma mthong nas/ de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar nas bsti gnas kyi gzhi
225a8('dul ba): de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/ phyogs 'di na ni gzhon nu nag po sring mo dang lhan cig ri dgas kyi phru gu dang rtag tu rtse rtse/ 'di ni de gnyis kyi sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/ 'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha spyad yin na de
225b1('dul ba): gnyis mi snang na/ gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi/ lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal lta srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re zhing / bu mthong bar 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas mig mchi mas
225b2('dul ba): gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo gnyis gang du mchis/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas/ /bus pa
225b3('dul ba): de gnyis de la byin/ /de dag rjes su yi rang rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyags sbyin ma ri dgas mo mda' dug can gyis phog pa bzhin du sa la sgyel nas nya chu'i gnas nas phyung ba bzhin du ni 'gre ldog par byed/
225b4('dul ba): krung krung bu stor ba bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du ngu / ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs 'don cing smras pa/ pad ma gzhon nu lta bu'i byang bzhin can/ /lag pa pad ma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can/ /bdag gi bu gnyis sdug
225b5('dul ba): bsngal ma myong ba/ /'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /ri dgas bu ltar drang zhing ri dgas mig /ri dgas lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na/ /de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur/ /gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing
225b6('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyur/ /mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni/ /snying rjes ngu ba shin tu sdug bsngal ba/ /de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas/ /skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho/ /de gnyis bdag gis pang nas
225b7('dul ba): bskyed bskyed pa/ /zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za/ /bzod dang gnam pas bla ma brtag dka' ba/ bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ /de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang / /rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lums spangs pa las/ /
225b8('dul ba): skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas/ /bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ /skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs nas/ /de gnyis su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni/ /de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal
226a1('dul ba): yongs su gzir/ /bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ /srog chags sdug pa brgya dang bral ba yi/ /sdig las shin tu mi bzad 'dir byas pa/ /des na ba be'u med bzhin cho nges 'debs/ /bden tshig gang gis
226a2('dul ba): bdag ni rtag tu yang / /sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa/ /bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po/ /bran du gyur pa las ni thar bar shog /rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs pa'i
226a3('dul ba): shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas snying du sdug nas 'khyud de smras pa/ bus pas ril ba chung ngus chu bcus pa/ /lo ma rnams las chu thigs 'dzag pa yi/ /ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa
226a4('dul ba): bzhin/ /bus pa nu zho ma blud lta bur ngu / /yang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ de yi ne'u zla
226a5('dul ba): mthong bar 'dod pa gang / /nags su sa tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa/ /ri dgas phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang / /bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i
226a6('dul ba): lam der rjes bcad pa dang / bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyi rjes drang por ma byung gi gya gyus gang bar mthong nas lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/ ji ltar 'then pa'i rjes byung dang / /la lar myur du song ba
226a7('dul ba): las/ /brdegs te khrid par gdon mi za/ /kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog /mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer/ /ma mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu/ /ri dgas bzhin du mig kyang rig rig ste/ /rkang
226a8('dul ba): pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu/ de nas byang chub sems dpas de de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis/ /
226b1('dul ba): btang ba ma yin sdang bas min/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /gtang bar dka' ba'i bu de btang / /mchog tu gtang dka' bdag nyid dang / /bu dang chung ma rnams btang nas/ /sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du/ /byang chub
226b2('dul ba): mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brten gtang dka' ba'i/ /bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang / /bdag dang chung ma bzhon dang nor yang btang byas te/ /kun la thams cad gtang
226b3('dul ba): ba'i blo gros nga la yod/ /de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis/ /khyod blo gzhan du ma gyur cig /gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed na/ /dogs pa med
226b4('dul ba): par bdag stsol gcig / gzhan yang dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi phyir/ /sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi/ /don de myur du thob nas ni/ /srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub
226b5('dul ba): sems dpa' dang / rgyags sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung ba dang / shin tu bya dka' bar rig nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te steng gi nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags nas snang ba rgya
226b6('dul ba): chen pos nags de gsal bar byas te/ nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can/ /longs spyod la chags snying gi zhags pa bu
226b7('dul ba): yis bcings pa'i nang na yang / /khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' ba bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas/ /nges par go 'phang bde dang zhi ba dri med dka' ba med par 'thob/ /de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams
226b8('dul ba): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ 'di gcig pu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang ngo snyam nas/ de nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/
227a1('dul ba): yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las/ /'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba/ /rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di/ /bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze la smras pa/ ngo tsha med cing
227a2('dul ba): brkam pa khyod/ /'di na bram ze tha shal te/ /khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing / /dam chos dga' ba nga 'dod dam/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis rgyags sbyin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang /
227a3('dul ba): de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag ni bdag la g.yar ngan med/ /de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags/ /gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes/ /de ltar khyod slad g.yar ngan bgyid/ /de nas byang chub
227a4('dul ba): sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ go 'phang mi zad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag la/ /sa steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos/ /khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs/ /bdag ni ri dgas 'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas
227a5('dul ba): 'theng / /de skad ces smras pa dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rab tu dga' bas bsams pa dang / sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir/ /bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/ /rgyags sbyin 'di yang yongs btang nas/ /yongs su gzung ba med par 'gyur/ /
227a6('dul ba): snyam du rig nas rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste/ bram ze de la smras pa/ bdag gi mchis brang sdug pa 'di/ /snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan/ /ya rabs tshul can snyan par smra/ /bram ze'i mchog khyod bzhes su gsol/ /
227a7('dul ba): de nas mchi ba bzang po yi/ /chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang / /chu la gru ni ji lta bar/ /sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g.yos/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/ khyo dang bu dang bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag
227a8('dul ba): nas dbugs brdzangs pas sgra ngar ngar por 'gags bzhin 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la/ /ci 'dra ba yi las ngan byas/ /de nas ba be'u shi ba bzhin/ /skye bo med pa'i nags na ngu / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
227b1('dul ba): gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te/ rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ skal bzangs bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi/ /bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha min 'joms byed de/ /khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog
227b2('dul ba): tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis/ /bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis/ /de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ spyan stong ldan pa bdag gi bu/ /
227b3('dul ba): bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing / /mes bo'i drung du phyin par yang / /sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod/ /de skad ces smras nas yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste rgyags
227b4('dul ba): sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pa nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di/ /g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas/ /khyod kyis su la'ang ma sbyin cig /bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur/ /
227b5('dul ba): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u dang bu mo khyer ba de ji ltar grong khyer gzhan zhig yin no snyam nas grong khyer de nyid du song ste bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams pa de lta bur rmongs par byas so/ /ji tsam na
227b6('dul ba): blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyod kyi dbon po nag po dang / /dra ba can dang de gnyis ni/ /bram ze shin tu ma rungs pas/ /grong khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis/ /de skad thos nas rgyal po de
227b7('dul ba): sems mi dga' nas smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig /blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang grong khyer ba rnams myur du rgyal po'i mdun du nye bar lhags so/ /ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa
227b8('dul ba): dang / mi'i dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bos gos med cing / /lus rbeg dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni/ /mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te/ /pho brang 'khor mi blon tshogs bud med dag kyang ngu bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos
228a1('dul ba): blon po rnams la smras pa/ gang zhig nags na gnas na yang / /sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid/ /mig bzangs de ni myur du 'dir/ /chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi
228a2('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shi ba dang / bram ze dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams lhan cig tu bsti gnas der song nas byang chub sems
228a3('dul ba): dpa' la gsol ba btab ste rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go/ /de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang /
228a4('dul ba): gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub don du gnyer ba yis/ /rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang / /
228a5('dul ba): 'jigs pa med par sbyin pa gtang / /gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang / /rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang / /de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin/ /chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /
228a6('dul ba): bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /mi yis dag pa thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang /
228a7('dul ba): phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po
228a8('dul ba): thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/ nga nyid kyis de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas so/ /
228b1('dul ba): rgyal po chen po nga'i sbyin pa 'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
228b2('dul ba): chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /
228b3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer du rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba/
228b4('dul ba): 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun dang / nad rab tu zhi ba/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang phun sum tshogs pa/ bu gcig pa la byams pa bzhin du rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/ chos bzhin
228b5('dul ba): gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las
228b6('dul ba): khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ 'phral ba'i dbyes che ba zhig btsas te/ de'i nye du rnams 'dus nas khye'u'i ming
228b7('dul ba): cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /shes ldan dag gzhon nu 'di ni rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyi bu yin pas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes gzhon nu thams cad sgrol du ming
228b8('dul ba): btags nas/ ma ma brgyad la gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ gnas lnga rnams la byang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de gang ci slong ba de thams cad slong ba po dag la sbyin par byed pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba thams
229a1('dul ba): cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags so/ /khams kyi rgyal phran gyi bu mo rgyags sbyin ma zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de de'i ched du bslangs nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
229a2('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na khye'u zhig btsas pa dang / de'i ming nag po zhes bya bar btags so/ /yang de dang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i
229a3('dul ba): ming dra ba can zhes bya bar btags so/ /rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mthus khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed do/ /des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ bu bdag
229a4('dul ba): cag gis gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de dag thams cad kyang glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis khyod thams cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan ni zhog shig / khams kyi rgyal phran
229a5('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi mthus na bdag cag thams cad rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'dis zil gyis mnan/ kha cig gis smras pa/ rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes
229a6('dul ba): bya ba zhig yod do/ /de'i mthus bdag cag 'dis zil gyis mnan to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ gang gis na glang po'i mchog de dgug pa'i thabs bzang po lta ci yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po thams cad
229a7('dul ba): kyi bshes gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de mi sbyin pa 'am mi gtong ba ci yang ma mchis te/ de ci slong ba de thams cad sbyin pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags kyis/ bram ze dag cig
229a8('dul ba): mngags dang de rnams kyis bslangs na khugs par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis bram ze dag bkug nas smras pa/ bram ze dag deng la thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal na/ thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba las glang po'i mchog slongs
229b1('dul ba): shig / de dag mngags nas thams cad kyi grong rdal du dong ngo / /gzhon nu thams cad sgrol glang po'i mchog me tog kun da dang / ku mu da dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po'i mdog lta bu mche ba drug pa/ bdun legs par gnas pa/
229b2('dul ba): glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/ mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang / grogs po dang g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis
229b3('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba bzhin du grong khyer nas byung nas bskyed mos tshal logs su song ngo / /de nas mngags pa de dag gis gzhon nu thams cad sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /
229b4('dul ba): yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ /khyod kyis glang po mchog 'di ni/ /bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i
229b5('dul ba): mchog de las babs nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bram ze de dag la glang po'i mchog de bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng / /bram ze rnams la glang chen btang / /de bzhin
229b6('dul ba): bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la smras pa/ lha khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bgyi ba
229b7('dul ba): phyir rgol bas mngags pa la stsal to/ /rgyal pos thos nas shin tu khros 'khrugs te bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la thams cad sgrol khrid de shog shig /de rnams kyis de khrid de 'ongs pa dang / rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis
229b8('dul ba): thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ gzhon nu kho bos khyod la gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de thams cad ni glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis/ khyod thams cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog 'di
230a1('dul ba): ni zhog shig / ces snga mo zhig tu ma bsgo 'am/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis glang po'i mchog yongs su btang / des mnyan nas smras pa/ yab bslangs na ji ltar mi stsal/ ci ji snyed bslangs pa de thams cad sbyin nam tshigs su bcad de
230a2('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim na gnas pa'i skyes bu yis/ /ci rigs par ni sbyin pa gtang / /'on te nags su song na ni/ /nges pa yi ni mchog bya'o/ /yab gal te sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag bgyir ma mchis na dka' thub kyi nags su
230a3('dul ba): brten par bgyi'o/ /gzhon nu de bzhin du gyis shig /byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyags sbyin ma bdag ni dka' thub kyi nags su gnas kyis/ khyod khyim na bag yod par gnos shig /des
230a4('dul ba): smras pa/ rje'i sras dang thabs gcig dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par bgyi'o/ /rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa la dga' bas gal te khyod 'ga' zhig slong na byin par 'gyur ro/ /rje'i sras
230a5('dul ba): gal te khyod kyis btang na stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di dran par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/ yab gcig
230a6('dul ba): bdag gis sbyin slad glang chen btang / /nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyis/ /mi dbang khyod kyi phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/ /de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i
230a7('dul ba): slong bas mchi mas brnangs nas smras pa/ bu sbyin pa dang dka' thub kyi nags kyi blo gros 'di zlog shig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par yang / /gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi/ /sa bdag bdag ni sbyin
