290a3('dul ba): bdag gis dge ba mi shes te/ /phan tshun zla bltas 'ba' shig gis/ /rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni/ /mthong nas de tshe bsnyen bkur byas/ /'gron bu drug bcu rnams kyis ni/ /dri dang phreng ba byug nyos te/ /mchod rten la ni
290a4('dul ba): gdags byas pas/ /bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur/ /dge ba chung ngu byas pa ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /gal te rdzogs sangs shes gyur la/ /
290a5('dul ba): mchod rten de la bdag gis su/ /bkur sti byas par gyur na ni/ /legs pa mang byed 'gyur ba zhig /de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan mang po shes pa yis/ /mchod rten bkur sti byos shig dang / /
290a6('dul ba): 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/ /thams cad gzigs pas mang thos dang / /sna tshogs gtam dang dge ba yi/ /spobs ldan tshigs bcad byed pa ni/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan ngag dbang
290a7('dul ba): ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ngag dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa
290a8('dul ba): b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang nga rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
290b1('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len gyis smras pa/ bdag ni tshong dpon bur gyur nas/ /pha yi khyim na dbang byed tshe/ /bdag gi pha ni yid bsrungs shing / /ma la log pa mi mthun byas/ /pha dang sring mo spun dang ni/ /bran dang las byed
290b2('dul ba): rnams la yang / /zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang / /ma la spyo ba byas nas su/ /bdag ni ser snas zil non pas/ /ma la zas ni ma byin par/ /khros pas tshig tu smras pa ni/ /zas su rdo ba zo zhig byas/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa
290b3('dul ba): des/ /rab tu tsha dang thig nag gi/ dmyal bar lan mang lhung nas ni/ /sdug bsngal mi nyung thob par gyur/ /dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi srid pa thob pa na/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /bdag ni rdo ba za bar gyur/ /
290b4('dul ba): skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /bdag gis rdo ba mang zos shing / /de bzhin bkres skom sdug bsngal gyis/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /
290b5('dul ba): ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas seng ge yi/ /
290b6('dul ba): sgra sgrogs pa yi mchog tu bstan/ /bdag gis nyon mongs thams cad spangs/ /nyon mongs bral bas zag pa med/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /de ltar rdzu 'phrul thob gyur kyang / /phug na bdag gi zas mchis pa/ /rdo ba nyid du
290b7('dul ba): gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa ni/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /
290b8('dul ba): de ltar ma dros mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //
291a1('dul ba): de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang
291a2('dul ba): ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /tshong dpon bu phor gyur nas ni/ /bdag ni nor dang
291a3('dul ba): 'bru mang zhing / /skye bo'i tshogs kyis bkur ba dang / /rgyal po dang ni grong mi dang / /gsang tshig brjod pa rnams kyis bkur/ /blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang / /dar la bab pa gzugs kyis rgyags/ de nas bdag ni shing rtar zhugs/ /skye bo'i tshogs
291a4('dul ba): kyis mdun byas nas/ 'dod pa kun dang ldan gyur cing / /bskyed mos tshal der dge sbyong ni/ /dbang po legs par bsdams pa dang / /dbang po zhi bas rgyu byed pa/ /chos gos rnying pa can zhig mthong / /dge sbyong de mthong bdag gis ni/ /yid mi bde ba
291a5('dul ba): skyes gyur te/ /de skyon med kyang mi sdug nas/ /smad cing spyo ba byas pa ni/ /kha dog ngan cing 'jigs par snang / /mdze can lus ni lus rma can/ /sha bri ngan cing rtsa 'thon pa/ /rab tu byung 'di su yi yin/ /ngag gi nyes pa spyad pa dang / /las kyi rnam
291a6('dul ba): par smin pa des/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes par gyur/ dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /kha dog ngan cing sdug bsngal ldan/ /mdze can lus ni lus rma can/ /sha bri ngan cing rtsa 'thon gyur/ /lag
291a7('dul ba): na gyo mo thogs shing rgyu/ /sha na'i ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon/ /phyag dar phung po'i steng na nyal/ /gnas med mgon med skyob pa med/ /zas kyi ched du sprang ba dang / /gang dang gang du song na yang / /dbyug pa can gyis phyir bzlog cing / /
291a8('dul ba): de dag bdag la smod par byed/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa der/ /bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /sems can kun gyis bdag gi ming / /nyes 'ongs pa zhes
291b1('dul ba): smad pa byas/ /kun gyi yid du mi 'ong bas/ /de tshe smad pa byed par 'gyur/ /bdag gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun gyis byas/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni chen po la/ /dam pa'i gnas ni ston pa mthong / /skye bo'i tshogs
291b2('dul ba): de mthong nas ni/ /ji tsam 'dod pa'i zas dang skom/ /rnyed par gyur na stes snyam nas/ /myur du brgyugs te phyin pa dang / /skye bo'i tshogs ni chos kyi phyir/ /'dug pa de ni mthong nas kyang / /zas sbyin pa ni med do zhes/ /bdag ni re chad slar
291b3('dul ba): log go/ /de nas thub pa thugs rje can/ /mgon pos bdag la bka' stsal pa/ /'ongs pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am/ /stan 'di la ni khyod 'dug shig /bdag ni dga' ba thob gyur nas/ /thal mo legs sbyar de'i 'og tu/ /ston pa'i zhabs
291b4('dul ba): la phyag byas nas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bdag 'dug go/ /de nas ston pa thugs rje can/ /gau tam rjes su thugs brtse bas/ /rim pa bzhin gyi gtam gsungs pas/ /bdag ni bden pa mthong bar bgyis/ /bden pa mthong nas thub chen la/ /
291b5('dul ba): de nas bdag gis rab 'byung gsol/ /gau tam thugs rje chen pos bdag /rjes su brtse bas rab tu phyung / /'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa yis/ /bdag ming legs 'ong zhes btags shing / /me yi khams la snyoms 'jug
291b6('dul ba): pa/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan legs 'ongs kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /legs 'ongs kyi
291b7('dul ba): le'u ste dgu pa'o/ / // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis rang gi
291b8('dul ba): las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ grong mchog rgyal po'i
292a1('dul ba): khab tu ni/ /tshong dpon phyug por gyur pa na/ /de ni mu ge byung gyur nas/ /drang srong rnams ni gso skal dgos/ /de na bdag gi gso skal du/ /skal dang ldan pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /zag pa med pa'i bsil gyur pa'i/ /
292a2('dul ba): drang srong mdzes pa gcig cig byon/ /sems ni ser sna'i skyon can gyis/ /bdag gis sdig pa bsams pa ni/ /da lta'i dus su dge sbyong 'di/ /lo bdun du ni su zhig gso/ /khyi yi gcin ni bskol ba yis/ /
292a3('dul ba): de nas 'bras kyi chan btsos te/ /de na drang srong za ru bcug /de tshe de ni 'chi dus byas/ /sdig pa'i las ni de byas pas/ /bsdus gzhom dang ni ngu 'bod dang / /de bzhin tsha ba rab tsha ba'i/ /dmyal ba rnams su yun
292a4('dul ba): ring btsos/ /dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /mi yi srid pa thob na yang / /nad bu can la gzhan dbang dang / /sdug bsngal gyis ni bdag dus byas/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /
292a5('dul ba): mi sdug nad dang mi bzad pas/ /rtag tu bdag ni dus byas so/ /bdag gi skye ba'i tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i
292a6('dul ba): bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /btsun pa da ltar na yang bdag /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing zag med kyang / /nad bu can la 'gre ldog
292a7('dul ba): pa/ /de lta bus ni bdag 'tsho'o/ /de ltar gnas brtan dga' yod kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ma 'gags pa'i grogs po dga' yod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
292a8('dul ba): sdom ni/ 'od srung shA ri'i bu dang ni/ /maud gal bu dang mdzes ldan dang / /sna ma gro bzhin ngag dbang dang / /bsod snyoms legs 'ongs dga' yod do/ /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags
292b1('dul ba): pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas
292b2('dul ba): de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dgon pa'i drang srong gyur/ /grong du bsod snyoms phyir song na/ /rnam par sngos shing bam pa yis/ /bud med kyi ni ro zhig mthong / /bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag byas te/ /
292b3('dul ba): dkyil mo dkrung bcas 'dug nas ni/ /rtse gcig shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /der ni mi sdug bsgom pa byas/ /bdag 'dug pa las de yi lto/ /rdol nas 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ba/ /thos par gyur nas bdag kyang ni/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs
292b4('dul ba): par gyur/ /de yi lto na yod pa yi/ /ngan skyugs dang ni khrag dang ni/ /rul pa'i dri dang mi gtsang ba/ /kun nas rab tu 'dzag pa mthong / /rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dang / /snying dang de bzhin glo ba la/ /srin bu brgya phrag za byed nas/ /slar
292b5('dul ba): yang sems ni mnyam par bzhag / de ci 'dra bar 'di de 'dra/ /'di ci 'dra bar de de 'drar/ /phyi yi ro ni mthong gyur nas/ /rang gi lus la gtod par byed/ /de nas ting 'dzin las langs nas/ /bsti gnas su ni slar log ste/ /
292b6('dul ba): de tshe bsod snyoms ma spyad de/ /zas kyang bza' ba ma byas so/ /gang tshe bdag kyang grong khyer du/ /zas kyi ched du zhugs pa na/ /yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs mthong nas/ /de la mi gtsang bsgom byas pa/ /de yi ro ni ci 'dra bar/ /
292b7('dul ba): gzugs gtogs de kun de 'dra ste/ /khong pa mi gtsang bas gang ba/ /thams cad smad pa yin no zhes/ /de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms pas/ /bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshad med
292b8('dul ba): pa/ /bzhi po legs par bsgoms byas pas/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ /tshangs pa yi ni 'jig rten skyes/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten shi 'phos bdag /bA rA Na sI'i grong du skyes/ /tshong dpon mchog gi bu gcig par/ /
293a1('dul ba): dpal ldan bdag nyid der skyes te/ /kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /mthar phyin gnas ni thob par gyur/ /bdag ni nyin mo yongs rgyu zhing / /mtshan mo dag ni nyal bar byed/ /myur bar de nas langs pa na/ /de na bud
293a2('dul ba): med mang po dag / rdza rnga dang ni rnga chen dang / /khar rnga pi bang sngas bcug nas/ /sgren mor bla rdol byed pa dang / /lag brkyang nas ni gnyid log mthong / /de nas bdag gi sngon gyi rgyu/ /mthu chen po ni skyes par gyur/ /bdag la de nas bud med
293a3('dul ba): la/ /dur khrod mi gtsang 'du shes byung / /de nas skyo bar gyur nas ni/ /bdag gis sngangs pa'i tshig smras pa/ /grogs po bdag ni gtses gyur te/ /kun nas 'tshe bas reg par gyur/ /de nas mal nas langs nas ni/ /khang bzangs
293a4('dul ba): nas ni shod du babs/ /lhas ni rjes su snying brtse bas/ /bdag gi sgo ni rnam par phye/ /grong khyer nas ni mngon byung nas/ /'bab chu'i ngogs su nye bar song / /bdag gis pha rol 'gram na ni/ /dge sbyong dbang po bsdams pa mthong / /
293a5('dul ba): bdag gis dge sbyong de mthong nas/ /sgra gsang stod de smras pa ni/ /dge sbyong bdag ni gtses gyur te/ /grogs po bdag la 'tshe bas reg /de nas ston pas bdag la yang / /de tshe bdud rtsi'i tshig gsungs pa/ /gzhon nu ma 'jigs khyod
293a6('dul ba): tshur shog / 'dir ni khyod la 'tshe ba med/ /bdag gis nor bu'i lham phud de/ /'bab chu yi ni ngogs rgal nas/ /sangs rgyas gang zag bla med pa/ /thugs rje can gyi spyan sngar song / /de nas bdag skom thugs chud nas/ /gang
293a7('dul ba): zag zla med ston pa des/ /snyan pa'i chos ni bka' stsal pa/ /de ni so sor bdag gis rtogs/ /de nas bdag gis bden mthong nas/ /thub chen rab 'byung gsol ba btab/ /gau tam thugs rje chen po yis/ /thugs brtse ba
293a8('dul ba): yis rab tu phyung / /mtshan gcig lon nas de nas ni/ /nyi ma 'char ka tsam na ni/ /bdag gi zag pa kun zad cing / /bdag ni bsil gyur mya ngan 'das/ /de ltar gnas brtan grags pa ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /
293b1('dul ba): rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dpal
293b2('dul ba): skyed tshe dang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/
293b3('dul ba): bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/ /ston pa 'od srung mya ngan 'das/ /rgyal po kri kis rin chen las/ /byas pa'i mchod rten chen po brtsigs/ /rgyal po kri ki grags ldan bu/ /bdag ni thu bor gyur pa na/ /bdag gis thog mar gdugs kyis ni/ /
293b4('dul ba): rgyal ba'i mchod rten la gdags byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /phyug cing longs spyod che ba dang / /
293b5('dul ba): nor dang 'brur ni ldan pa yi/ /bdag ni yon bdag chen por gyur/ /bdag gis tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /sbyin pa mi nyung btang byas te/ /slong ba pa dang dge sbyong dang / /bram ze so sor tshim par byas/ /shin du dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /'dod
293b6('dul ba): chags bral zhing zag med pa/ /tha ba med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /lnga brgya po dag tshim par byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /srid pa tha ma 'di la ni/ /shAkya phyug po'i rigs su skyes/ /btsas ma thag tu tshig smras pa/ /
293b7('dul ba): khyim 'di na ni nor 'bru dag /ji ga cung zad cig yod dam/ /'di ltar sbyin pa ngas btang ste/ /dbul po rnams ni tshim par bya/ /dbul po rnams la zas byin dang / /gtong bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /ji ga nor lta yod dam
293b8('dul ba): khyed/ /bdag la myur du legs par smros/ /de dag bdag gi tshig thos nas/ /yid skyo bar ni gyur nas su/ /ma ma gtogs par phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs su rnam par rgyug par byed/ /ma ni bu la byams pa yis/ /de tshe bdag
294a1('dul ba): la 'di skad smras/ /lha 'am mi 'am gnod sbyin nam/ /khyod su bdag la myur du smros/ /ma gcig khyod kyi bu bdag ni/ /mi lags srin po ma lags te/ /sbyin bdag tshe rabs dran pas na/ /rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba spro/ /bdag gi
294a2('dul ba): tshigs de mas thos nas/ /yid ni dga' bar gyur nas kyang / /dbugs 'byin byed cing smras pa ni/ /bu gcig ci dga' sbyin pa thong / /yo byad mang po rnams kyis kyang / /bdag la mas ni gso ba byas/ /kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /
294a3('dul ba): bdag ni blta bas ngoms mi myong / /bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang / /khyim de nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /gser dang bran dang las byed pa/ /rnams kyang rtag tu 'phel bar gyur/ /dpal skyed khye'u zhig btsas gyur la/ /
294a4('dul ba): btsas ma thag tu smras pas na/ /bdag gi ming ni gnyen rnams kyis/ /dpal skyed ces ni bya bar btags/ /de nas bdag gis sbyin btang zhing / /dbul po rnams ni tshim byas te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes
294a5('dul ba): byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bdag ni rnyed med 'jigs pa 'am/ /bu lon nyen pas rab byung min/ /de tshe dad pas rab byung nas/ /mngon shes drug po bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni rgyal po blon po dang / /de bzhin
294a6('dul ba): grong mi rnams kyis mchod/ /zas dang btung ba gos dang ni/ /gnas mal yang ni rnyed par gyur/ /de ltar gnas brtan dpal skyed kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /
294a7('dul ba): dpal skyed kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la la 'di skad ces smras so/ tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed
294a8('dul ba): kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i
294b1('dul ba): pho brang bshes ldan du/ /bdag sngon spos 'tshong gyur pa las/ /rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi/ /dge slong dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ /khyed cag ji snyed bzhed pa yi/ /snyun sman bdag gis dbul bgyis te/ /
294b2('dul ba): shun pa rtsa ba 'bras bu'i sman/ /dge 'dun bdag gis tshim par bgyis/ /dge 'dun dbyar ni spyan drangs nas/ /bdag la dge slong gcig cig gis/ /a ru ra gcig ma gtogs par/ /de na 'ga' yang slong ba med/ /
294b3('dul ba): bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /bdag ni log par lhung ma gyur/ /sman sbyin pa'i rnam smin ni/ /mthu chen 'di ni blta bar gyis/ /dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /a ru ra ni gcig byin pas/ /
294b4('dul ba): yun ring mtho ris rnams su dga'/ /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /yul 'khor bsod snyoms len pa dag /slob pa na yang ma myong ngo / /nub gsum kho na rig pa ni/ /gsum po bdag
294b5('dul ba): gis mngon sum byas/ /ngan ngon gyis ni 'tsho byas shing / /phyag dar khrod kyi chos gos 'chang / /khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba dang / /bdag ni 'dres par mi gnas te/ /bdag gi tshe ni lo brgya dang / /drug bcu lhag cig lon na
294b6('dul ba): yang / /da tsam bar du 'ang bdag gis ni/ /na ba mngon par mi dran te/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /chung ngu bgyis pa 'di dran te/ /de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong 'dod/ /bde ba 'byung ba nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan
294b7('dul ba): bak+ku las/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /bak+ku la'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/
294b8('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu
295a1('dul ba): ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/ /bdag ni lham mkhan gyur pa na/ /mu ge byung
295a2('dul ba): nas de nas bdag / ko ba'i ras ma rnams 'tshed do/ /bza' bar bya ba kho na'i phyir/ /ko ba'i ras ma 'tshed pa las/ /dge sbyong gzhan zhig zas kyi phyir/ /bsod snyoms la ni byon pa dang / /de la bdag gis sems dad pas/ /
295a3('dul ba): ko ras kyi ni thug pa byin/ /dge sbyong des ni longs spyad nas/ /de nas nam mkhar 'phags par gyur/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/ /de nas gang dang gang du ni/ /song ba kun du 'breng
295a4('dul ba): byas so/ /dga' ba rgya chen thob nas kyang / /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dang bdag /lhan cig 'dug par gyur par shog /dge slong 'di yi las kyis ni/ /dri med chos ni gang reg pa/ /bdag gis chos
295a5('dul ba): de rig gyur ces/ /de tshe smon lam btab par gyur/ /kha dog ldan pa ma yin zhing / /dri ni smad par gyur pa dang / /ro dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i/ /sbyin pa bdag gis de tshe btang / /dge ba chung ngu byas pas kyang / /bde ba mang po myong bar
295a6('dul ba): gyur/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /bdag gis smon lam gang
295a7('dul ba): btab pa'i/ /byang chub dam pa 'di reg ste/ /bdag gis da ltar bsil gyur pa'i/ /mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob/ /de nas gnas brtan chen po ni/ /gnas brtan zhes bya mthu chen gyis/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /
295a8('dul ba): gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa lting rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa gnas brtan gsum la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
295b1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas de rnams kyis kyang lung bstan par brtsams pa/ bdag cag gsum
295b2('dul ba): ni spun gyur nas/ /lhan cig tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /'od srung mchod rten ral ba dang / /shag shig 'dug pa mthong gyur nas/ /tshongs pa thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /des ni slar yang sar pa brtsigs/ /spun rnams dag ni lhan cig tu/ /
295b3('dul ba): gdugs gsum zhig ni gdugs pa byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /mtho ris gnas su yun ring dga'/ /mi rnams su ni slar 'ongs nas/ /phyug po'i rigs chen dag tu skyes/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma mthong nas/ /mu stegs
295b4('dul ba): gzhan las rab tu byung / /nai rany+dza na'i chu ngogs su/ /cho 'phrul mdzad pa mthong nas ni/ /de nas de la rab 'byung phyir/ /bdag cag gis kyang gsol ba btab/ /de nas thugs rje can gyi ni/ /thugs brtses bdag cag rab tu phyung / /
295b5('dul ba): bdag cag ga yA mgor son nas/ /gau ta ma'i bstan pa thos/ /de nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa dam pa thob/ /da ltar ston pa bkur byas shing / /de tshe mchod rten mngon btud pas/ /bdag cag kun ni rab byung nas/ /
295b6('dul ba): bsil bar gyur te mya ngan 'das/ /lting rgyas dang ni chu klung dang / /ga yA 'od srung gnas brtan gsum/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /lting rgyas dang / chu klung dang / ga yA 'od srung rnams kyi le'u ste
295b7('dul ba): bcwa lnga pa'o/ / // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa tshe dang ldan pa lting rgyas dang /
295b8('dul ba): chu klung dang / /ga yA 'od srung rnams kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
296a1('dul ba): lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dri 'tshong gyur pa na/ /dri rnams 'tshong la mkhas gyur pas/ /der ni de tshe nyo ba'i phyir/ /bud med gzhon nu ma dag 'ongs/ /der ni bdag gis gzugs ldan ma'i/ /bud med 'ongs pa
296a2('dul ba): mthong nas ni/ /'dren brkyang gis ni tshig smras shing / /chags pa'i sems kyis reg par byas/ /'du zhing lhan cig 'khod pa 'am/ /mi tshangs spyod pa spro med kyang / /ma brtags gzhan gyi bud med la/ /lag pas
296a3('dul ba): reg par byas pas na/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes/ /slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/ /lag pa g.yas pa bskams par gyur/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes
296a4('dul ba): pa na/ /rtag tu bdag gi lag pa ni/ /g.yas pa zha zhing rnam par bskams/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /mya ngan 'das pa'i bder gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /
296a5('dul ba): btsun pa bdag gis mi dge ba/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag ni rdzu 'phrul ldan gyur na 'ang / /lag pa g.yas 'di ji
296a6('dul ba): lta bar/ /g.yon pa de lta ma lags so/ /skyes pa 'am bud med gang yang rung / /byi bo byed pa gang yin pa/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni/ /de ni sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa'i mis/ /rab 'bar
296a7('dul ba): me ni ji lta bar/ /gzhan gyi bud med rnam spang zhing / /rang gi chung mas chog par gyis/ /gzhan gyi bud med mthong nas ni/ /skyes pa gang zhig de la chags/ /dmyal ba'i tshor bas nyen pa yi/ /sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur/ /
296a8('dul ba): bdag gis de ltar sdig byas pas/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan du na/ /yun ring dmyal bar de yi ni/ /'bras bu mi nyung nyams su myong / /bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'dir/ /bla na med pa'i gnas thob nas/ /sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol
296b1('dul ba): zhing / /bsil bar gyur cing mya ngan 'das/ /de lta bas na bde 'dod cing / /sdug bsngal nyid ni mi 'dod pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med 'gro mi bya/ /de ltar sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnas brtan grags pas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun
296b2('dul ba): 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan no/ /gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa me skyes la 'di skad ces
296b3('dul ba): smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa me skyes tshe dang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis de'i tshe rang gi las
296b4('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /rnam par gzigs kyi tshangs spyod tshe/ /nyon mongs med ces bya ba yi/ /tshong dpon nor mang zhig tu gyur/ /thub chen rnam par gzigs pa yi/ /'khor ni stong phrag
296b5('dul ba): brgya dag dang / /drug bcu rtsa gnyis yod par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po bshes ldan dang / /bdag gis mi yi khyu mchog ni/ /zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/ /phyir zhing bshos thang bskyed pa yis/ /tshogs dang bcas te
296b6('dul ba): tshim par byas/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas zla gsum du/ /bshos gsol de nas bshes ldan gyis/ /de tshe rjes gcod ston mo ni/ /bza' bca' dang ni na bza' dang / /gnas mal dag dang ldan pa gsol/ /de nas bskyed mos tshal
296b7('dul ba): bstan pa/ /rgyal po des ni phul bar gyur/ /de bzhin dge slong re re la/ /gos kyis kun nas g.yogs pa'i stan/ /brgya stong dag dang de'i tshe/ /gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa yi/ /glang po shin tu legs brgyan pa/ /mi nyung
296b8('dul ba): ba dag sbyin par btang / /dge slong re re'i spyi bor ni/ /de tshe gdugs kyang 'dzin par byed/ /de nas bud med legs brgyan lus/ /tsan dan a ga rus bskus pa/ /de dag dge slong re re la 'ang / /bsnyen bkur dag ni byed du bcug /
297a1('dul ba): rgyal po des ni de lta bu'i/ /rjes gcod pa la bkur sti byas/ /drang srong gtso bo rnam par 'dren/ /rgyal pos tshim par byas pa dang / /stan de phun sum tshogs mthong nas/ /de nas bdag gis bsams pa ni/ /bdag la bza' dang bca'
297a2('dul ba): yod kyang / /'di 'dra ba yi stan med de/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra dang / /glang po bdag la ga la bdog /lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur ba/ /brgya byin bdag gi drung du 'ongs/ /de nas brgya byin bdag la smras/ /khyod kyi grogs po ngas bya zhes/ /
297a3('dul ba): des ni lha yi bskyed mo tshal/ /mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba sprul/ /lha'i gdan ni bshams nas ni/ /lha yi g.yogs pa rnams kyis g.yogs/ /de nas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das/ /rnams gzigs 'jig rten gyis bkur ba/ /
297a4('dul ba): mi mchog de ni nyan thos bcas/ /gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs nas/ /sa srung la sogs glang po rnams/ /lha yi rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa/ /dge slong re re spyi bor ni/ /de tshe gdugs dag 'dzin par byed/ /de nas rnam par 'dren
297a5('dul ba): pa ni/ /lha'i zhal zas rnams kyis bstabs/ /thub pa nyan thos thabs gcig la/ /bdag gis lha yi gos kyis g.yogs/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /bsod nams byas
297a6('dul ba): pas lha dang ni/ /mi yi nang du mdzes gyur pas/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /ngan 'gro bdag gis mi shes so/ /rnam par gzigs pa dpal ldan po/ /drang srong chen pos bsnyen bkur bas/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma
297a7('dul ba): 'di/ /rgyal po'i khab tu bdag skyes so/ /gzugs can snying po'i grong khyer du/ /nor chen phyug po'i khyim du ni/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos ni/ /de tshe bdag rjed bkur sti byas/ /blon po rnams dang grong mi la/ /kun nas
297a8('dul ba): sdug cing yid du 'ong / /lha yi 'dod pas rtag tu ni/ /srid pa 'dir ni bdag tshim byas/ /mir gyur na yang lha rnams kyi/ /'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong / /de nas ded dpon bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa po/ /thub pa chen po thugs
297b1('dul ba): brtse bas/ /rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gyur/ /sangs rgyas shes rab chen po ni/ /rgyal po'i khab byon bdag gis thos/ /bcom ldan thub de gang na bar/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis song ba dang / /'jig rten gsal ba 'od mdzad pa/ /sgron ma 'dzin pa
297b2('dul ba): mthong nas ni/ /de tshe babs te rkang pas ni/ /thub pa'i spyan sngar song nas kyang / /thub pa che la bdag mgu bas/ /zhabs gnyis la ni mgos phyag byas/ /skyes mchog la ni phyag byas nas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni 'dug nas su/ /'gro bas
297b3('dul ba): bsnyen bkur byas pa yi/ /dpa' chen bdud kyi 'ching ba bcad/ /ded dpon mi yi nyi ma ni/ /ring po ma thogs mnyes par byas/ /'jig rten ston pa bla med pa/ /des ni bdag la thugs brtse bas/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bshad de/ /
297b4('dul ba): de tshe bdag gis so sor rtogs/ /de nas bdag gis thugs rje can/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'di skad gsol/ /dpa' bo bdag ni rab 'byung zhing / /bsnyen par rdzogs par thob par 'tshal/ /de nas shes rab dam pa can/ /sangs
297b5('dul ba): rgyas gang zag zla med pas/ /dge slong tshur shog ces gsungs pas/ /bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /des na bdag ni bag yod cing / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan brtan po yis/ /bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das zhi ba'i/ /gnas kyi
297b6('dul ba): dam pa reg par gyur/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /srid par 'khor bar skye ba dang / /'chi ba rnams las bdag
297b7('dul ba): grol cing / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa las/ /thams cad du ni bdag grol to/ /de ltar gnas brtan me skyes kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /me skyes
297b8('dul ba): kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong tshe dang ldan
298a1('dul ba): pa me skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par
298a2('dul ba): byed de/ ka shi'i yul 'khor dar byed pa/ /rgyal po kri ki zhes bya byung / /rgyal po kri ki bu tha chungs/ /de yi tshe na bdag gyur to/ /'od srung dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /mchod rten chen po brtsigs pa dang / /pha yi yid ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /
298a3('dul ba): de la gdugs bu chung zhig phul/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod rten la/ /gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa des/ /rab byung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /lhan cig 'grogs gyur smon lam btab/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /
298a4('dul ba): gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di/ /bang mdzod stug por bdag skyes te/ /der yang tshong dpon khyim du skyes/ /rigs kyi bu gcig
298a5('dul ba): par gyur te/ /mi dbang kau rab bya dang ni/ /de bzhin kun sdug yid du 'ong / /de bzhin yul mi rnams dang ni/ /bdag ni gnyen tshogs yid du 'ong / /mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang / /gzugs bzang shin tu dbyibs legs shing / /
298a6('dul ba): mi yi 'byor pa rnams kyis ni/ /'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /ston pa dga' zhing yid 'ong ba/ /bang mdzod stug por gshegs pa ni/ /bdag gis mthong nas sems dad pas/ /rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab/ /
298a7('dul ba): ston pa gang zag zla med de/ /bsam pa kun la mkhas gyur pas/ /bdag gi bsam pa des mkhyen nas/ /rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa/ /pha ma dag gis ma gnang ba'i/ /gang zag dge yang sangs rgyas rnams/ /rab tu
298a8('dul ba): 'byin par mi mdzad kyis/ /song la bdag nyid thar bar gyis/ /de nas khyim du bdag song nas/ /pha ma gnyis la smras pa ni/ /yab gcig gnang bar mdzod cing bdag /khyim ma mchis par rab 'byung ngo / /pha mas bdag las thos nas ni/ /
298b1('dul ba): de tshe yid mi bder gyur nas/ /bu gcig khyod ni bdag cag gnyis/ /shi bar gyur na 'ang mi gnang ngo / /de thos nas ni bdag gis su/ /gal te mi gnang 'di nyid du/ /zas mi 'tshal bar bdag 'gum zhes/ /sa la yang ni nyal ba byas/ /
298b2('dul ba): de tshe dkar po'i chos dag gis/ /bskul nas rab 'byung don gnyer zhing / /thar par 'dod pas zhag drug tu/ /zan ma zos par 'dug pa dang / /de nas bdag dang mdza' ba yi/ /ne'u zlas pha ma la smras pa/ /'di ni gnang bar gyur na legs/ /khyed
298b3('dul ba): la shi bas ci zhig bya/ /gal te 'di ni rab 'byung bar/ /dga' na phyis kyang khyed cag gis/ /gson po nyid du bltas so cog /shi bar gyur na ci zhig rung / /gal te rab tu byung ba la/ /'di ni dga' bar ma gyur na/ /khyed kyir zad mod pha ma las/ /
298b4('dul ba): gzhan na bu gnas ga la yod/ /bdag gi snyan smra ne'u zla la/ /pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa ni/ /gal te rab 'byung lta byed na/ /de lta na lta gzhan du min/ /de nas ne'u zla bdag gi drung / /nye bar 'ongs nas smras pa ni/ /mkhas pa khyod ni pha ma
298b5('dul ba): yis/ /rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba ni/ /khyod la pha ma gnyis na re/ /gal te rab tu byung nas khyod/ /phyis kyang lta bar byed na ni/ /bu gcig song la rab tu byung / /legs shes bdag gis mnyan byas te/ /de nas nyam ni brtas byas nas/ /ston pa'i
298b6('dul ba): spyan sngar song nas ni/ /'di skad ces ni tshig gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni gnang lags na/ /thub chen khyod kyi bstan pa la/ /bde gshegs rab 'byung gsol 'debs na/ /rgyal ba bdag ni rab tu phyung / /de nas bdag ni rab byung nas/ /
298b7('dul ba): ston pa'i bstan la 'di ltar gnas/ /bdag gi kun sbyor thams cad zad/ /zag pa rnams ni bcom par gyur/ /bdag gis gdugs gcig btang bas ni/ /bde ba mang po myong bar gyur/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi yi rnams su gyur/ /
298b8('dul ba): thams cad gzigs pas dgon pa ba/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /de ltar thugs rje che rgyal la/ /yid ni rab tu dad byas te/ /mchod rten la ni bkur sti byas/ /'jigs pa che
299a1('dul ba): las rnam thar gyis/ /gnas brtan phyag dar khrod pa ni/ /yul 'khor skyong zhes grags pa yis/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /yul 'khor skyong gi le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po
299a2('dul ba): lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ga la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sa ga tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sa gas kyang da rang gi las
299a3('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa gas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dpon gyi/ /gtso bo nor chen bdag gyur to/ /dbyar gyi dus su drang srong ni/ /lnga brgya dag ni nye bar byon/ /der ni tshong dpon lnga brgya yang / /
299a4('dul ba): thams cad 'dus par gyur nas ni/ /kun gyis drang srong re re zhig /khyim khyim du ni bgo bar bya/ /rang gi don du kha zas ni/ /ji lta bu dag g.yo byed pa/ /dka' thub can de re re la 'ang / /rtag tu de 'dra kho na sbyin/ /de'i nang drang srong rgan po gang / /de ni bdag
299a5('dul ba): gi skal bar 'ongs/ /tshong dpon mchog la de bzhin du/ /thub pa mchog ste 'tsham bar gyur/ /bdag la lnga brgya pa yi zas/ /snod gang nas ni 'dren byed pa/ /de 'dra ba yi kha zas nyid/ /bdag gis dge slong de la byin/ /de nas de la bdag la ni/ /ser sna shin
299a6('dul ba): du mi bzad skyes/ /'di lta bu'i kha zas ni/ /bdag gis chung ma byin ma myong / /sring mo ma yin de bzhin du/ /bu dang bu mo dag dang ni/ /phu mo nu la 'ang ma byin na/ /dge slong 'di la zla gsum du/ /sbyin pa lta zhig smos ci dgos/ /bdag ni lnga brgya po dag gis/ /
299a7('dul ba): gong tshogs chen por 'dir gyur gyis/ /ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/ /bsad pa la ni brtson byas te/ /'di ni shi ba'i dus byas na/ /bdag la 'god pa mi 'byung zhes/ /de nas bdag gi sdig sems kyis/ /rta yi gcin ni bskol byas nas/ /nyes med
299a8('dul ba): pa ni bsad bya bar/ /kha zas rnams dang lhan cig byin/ /der ni zos ma thag tu yang / /mi bzad pa yi nad langs te/ /rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dag /ro smad nas ni zags par gyur/ /thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'/ /shes bzhin de nas dus
299b1('dul ba): las 'das/ /lha dang gnod sbyin gcig la gcig /sgra ni shin tu sgrogs byed pa/ /kye ma'o tshong dpon 'di re sdig /'di yis thub pa rang sangs rgyas/ /bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa/ /dbang ldan 'di ni bkrongs par
299b2('dul ba): gyur/ /nye du kun kyang 'khrugs nas ni/ /de nas bdag la smod byed pa/ /gang phyir thub pa 'di bsad pas/ /khyod kyis bsod nams min mang bskyed/ /nye du rnams kyi tshig thos nas/ /bdag kyang yid mi bde bar gyur/ /
299b3('dul ba): drang srong de dag bsags nas ni/ /de nas bdag gis nyes pa bshags/ /bzod pa gsol nas de nas yang / /nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /lnga brgya la ni zhal zas kyis/ /gus dang bcas pas tshim par byas/ /
299b4('dul ba): bdag gis sdig pa de bshags nas/ /bzod gsol drang srong de dag ni/ /zas dang btung bas tshim byas nas/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di 'dra dag dang ni/ /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /ji
299b5('dul ba): ltar 'di kun grol gyur pa/ /de bzhin 'ching las grol bar shog /bkren pa rnams kyi khyim du bdag /lan 'ga'ang skye bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi sems ni lan 'ga' yang / /ser sna skye bar ma
299b6('dul ba): gyur cig / bdag gis rang sangs rgyas bsad pa'i/ /shin tu mi bzad las byas pas/ /de nas 'chi 'pho dus byas nas/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni/ /yun ring lo ni stong dag tu/ /sdug
299b7('dul ba): bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/ /phyug cing nor chen gyur pa dang / /'jig rten rnams kyis mchod bkur na yang / /bdag ni myur du 'chi 'gyur zhing / /
299b8('dul ba): rtag tu bdag ni nang grol dag /'dzag pas 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /khyim pa'i rtags rnams spangs nas ni/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bstan la brtson 'grus byas pas na/ /'dod chags thams cad yang
300a1('dul ba): dag bton/ /gang tshe len pa med pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das par bdag gyur na'ang / /rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma nang / /de dag kyang ni 'dzag par gyur/ /bdag gis sdig las byas pa dang / /dge ba'i las byas gang yin
300a2('dul ba): pa/ /dge dang sdig pa de dag gi/ 'bras bu de dag nyams su myong / /mnyan yod dbus na skyes pa yi/ /dge slong mthu chen sa gas ni/ /ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sa ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //
300a3('dul ba): de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can dge slong sa gas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da tshe dang ldan pa 'od
300a4('dul ba): srung byin pa can gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ mu ge dag ni byung ba na/ /grong khyer pa ni mtha' dag gis/ /lo bdun tshang
300a5('dul ba): bar dge slong gi/ /dge 'dun dag ni spyan drangs so/ /de na bdag gi skal bar ni/ /rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/ /bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa'i/ /thub pa mdzes pa gcig cig 'ongs/ /bdag gis dam bcas byas pa ni/ /
300a6('dul ba): las mi byed na bu dang ni/ /nang mi yang rung su la yang / /bdag gis zas ni mi sbyin no/ /de ltar rnam par bsams nas ni/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i blo bsams pa/ /dge slong las mi byed pa 'di/ /bdag gis ci ste zas
300a7('dul ba): sbyin zhes/ /de nas drang srong bdag 'grogs nas/ /zhing las mtha' rnams blta ba'i phyir/ /mtha' dag tu ni bskor nas su/ /de yi 'og tu zas zar bcug /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /bsdus gzhom dang ni tsha ba yi/ /
300a8('dul ba): dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni/ /sdug bsngal kho na'i tshor ba thob/ /dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos bdag /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /de tshe brtson pa mang byas na 'ang / /sdug bsngal kho nas zas rnyed do/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /
300b1('dul ba): mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /yang dag dad pas rab byung nas/ /bdag gis zag pa rnams bcom ste/ /bdag gis mngon shes drug reg nas/ /dgra bcom nyid kyang thob par
300b2('dul ba): gyur/ /da dung du yang btsun pa bdag /'di ltar rdzu 'phrul ldan lags na 'ang / /da lta lan mang song nas ni/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni zas sgrub po/ /lam ni ring por song nas kyang / /bdag ni zas dag bsgrub pa na/ /gang tshe bdag ni dub gyur nas/ /
300b3('dul ba): de'i 'og tu zas 'grub bo/ /rus ni 'od srung las kyi ming / /byin pa can ni mthu chen pos/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chan du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /'od srung byin pa can gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // sdom ni/ grags ldan dang ni dpal
300b4('dul ba): skyed dang / /bak+ku la gsum grags pa dang / /me skyes dang ni yul 'khor skyong / /sa ga 'od srung byin pa can/ /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
300b5('dul ba): lam phran bstan tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu
300b6('dul ba): ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/ /bdag ni phag rdzir gyur pa na/ /phag rnams kha ni bcings nas su/ /'bab chu las ni sgrol bar byed/ /'bab chu las ni bsgral ba'i phyir/ /bdag gis chu dbus
300b7('dul ba): phyin pa dang / /bskyod par gyur pas dbugs subs nas/ /phag rnams thams cad shi bar gyur/ /skyob pa med cing mgon med pas/ /bdag kyang 'bab chus khyer ba las/ /drang srong rjes su brtse ba dag /'ongs nas bdag ni byung bar
300b8('dul ba): gyur/ /de dag gis bdag de las bsgral/ /de nas bdag gis rab tu byung / /bdag gis gdams ngag med par ni/ /'du shes med la snyoms par zhugs/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ /lha rnams su
301a1('dul ba): ni bdag skyes so/ lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /rmongs shing g.yer bo ma yin pas/ /bshad pa bdag
301a2('dul ba): gis ma rtogs so/ /btsun pa bdag gis zla gsum du/ /tshigs bcad gcig la zhugs nas ni/ /tshig bzhi pa yi rkang pa gcig /rtogs pas 'dod chags kun bton to/ /btsun pa de ltar bdag gis ni/ /
301a3('dul ba): las gang bgyis pa dran lags te/ /bskal pa mi nyung yun ring du/ /'khor ba 'dir ni bdag gis brgyugs/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /lam phran bstan gyis dkar gnag las/ /ma dros pa yi
301a4('dul ba): mtsho chen du/ /lung ni bstan pa byas pa yin/ /lam phran bstan kyi le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
301a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyi rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol gyis de'i tshe rang gi
301a6('dul ba): las kyi rgyu ba lung ston pa byed de/ sangs rgyas 'od srung mya ngan 'das/ /tha mar byung ba'i dge slong ni/ /sde snod gsum ldan mang du thos/ /chos kyi ser sna can du gyur/ /dge slong gzhan dag shes gyur na/ /
301a7('dul ba): bdag dang mtshungs par 'gyur 'ong zhes/ /bdag gis dge slong rnams la chos/ /ma ston cing ni ma bshad de/ /bdag gi drung du dge slong gang / /nye bar 'ongs nas 'dri byed na'ang / /thams cad gdams ngag ma byin par/ /thams cad
301a8('dul ba): du ni spyos shing bgyi/ /dge slong rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas/ /de tshe bdag la bkur sti byed/ /chos ni rab tu mi ston pa/ /khyod kyi da ni bza' min zer/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus bab tshe/ /bdag gi chos ni gzhan dag la/ /ma bstan de ni legs min zhes/ /
301b1('dul ba): bdag ni yid la 'gyod par gyur/ /tshe yi lhag ma nyung ngu zhig /zhag bdun lus nas bdag gis ni/ /rab tu byung ba rnams bsogs te/ /de nas nyes pa bshags pa byas/ /bdag gis nyes pa bshags byas shing / /ser sna de na rnam
301b2('dul ba): bsal nas/ /de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/ /don bzang ba yi chos bshad do/ /bdag gis blo la ci lcogs pas/ /legs par bshad pa'i chos thos nas/ /phan tshun 'doms shing gcig la gcig /smra bar yang ni byed du bcug /
301b3('dul ba): de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/ /chos ni cung zad gcig bshad pas/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa yi/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag tu dga'/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos te/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /grong khyer ser
301b4('dul ba): skya'i gzhi dag tu/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes/ /nor chen longs spyod chen po dang / gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang / /thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing / /phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar phyin to/ /khyim re nas ni skyes
301b5('dul ba): pa re/ /khyim med par ni rab 'byung las/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byor pas na/ /bdag ni rab 'byung ma btub bo/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa/ /bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/ /yang dang yang du rang 'byung ba/ /yang dag len
301b6('dul ba): pa skul ma mdzad/ /de nas ded dpon zla med pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni bdag gis gsol/ /re shig bdag gi lo bdun du/ /sbyin pa mi nyung btang bar bgyi/ /bdag gis sbyin pa dag btang nas/ /lo bdun lon par gyur pa dang / /
301b7('dul ba): shes rab mchog can khyod las ni/ /de nas bdag ni rab tu 'byung / /lo bdun dag ni thogs ches la/ /tshe ni cung zad tsam yin pas/ /sang nyid 'chi yang su shes kyis/ /de ring nyid du brtul te gyis/ /bdag gis gus pas sangs
301b8('dul ba): rgyas kyi/ /gsung ni slar bzlog ma byas par/ /btsun pa bdag ni dgung bdun na/ /thugs brtses rab tu dbyung ba mdzod/ /bdag gis zhag bdun sbyin btang ste/ /phongs pa rnams ni tshim byas nas/ /bdag gi phyir ni nye du dag /grong khyer du ni mel tse btsugs/ /snang ba chen
302a1('dul ba): po rnams kyis ni/ /grong khyer mchog ni gsal bar byas/ /skye bo dag gis ma tshor bar/ /rab 'byung phyir ni mngon du byung / /bdag ni dang bas rab byung nas/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la brtson byas te/ /lo ni nyi shu lnga lon
302a2('dul ba): yang / /sems mnyam pa yang ma thob bo/ /de nas bdag gi sdig pa'i sems/ /'dod la zhen pa skyes pa ni/ /bdud rtsi rtogs par ma gyur gyis/ /dman par slar ni bdag ldog snyam/ /de nas ngo tsha khrel yod pa/ /don chen dag ni
302a3('dul ba): skyes gyur pa/ /bdag la nye du'i tshogs smod cing / /skyon du yang ni 'grang 'gyur ba/ /de ni bdag dang 'tsham min zhing / /de ni bzang po ma yin gyis/ /bdag lta gson na'ang ci ru rung / /mtshon gyis gdab par bya'o snyam/ /
302a4('dul ba): mtshon rnon bdag gis blangs nas su/ /skyil mo dkrung ni bcas nas kyang / /mtshon ni ske la gtad pa las/ /de nas sems ni rnam par grol/ /bdag sems tha ba las grol nas/ /yang dang yang du brjod pa ni/ /e ma'o
302a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /e ma'o chos nyid e re bzang / /sngon ni bdag gi 'du shes gang / /so so'i skye bo shi bla snyam/ /bdag gis srog la ma bltas pas/ /zhi ba dam pa thos par gyur/ sngon ni 'khums
302a6('dul ba): par gyur pa yis/ /dam chos ser sna byas pa gang / /btsun pa de yi 'bras bu ni/ /sdug bsngal ba yis rnam par grol/ /bdag gis 'chi ba'i dus na chos/ /dam pa rab bstan gang yin pa'i/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /
302a7('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol phyin/ /shAkya'i bu pho dbang po brtul/ /sprul khol mthu chen ldan pas ni/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sprul khol gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //
302a8('dul ba): de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang da rang gi las
302b1('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon ni phrag khur khyer ba yi/ /rtswa thun dbul por gyur pa na/ /bdag gis dge sbyong grags ldan pa/ /nyon mongs bcom la bsod snyoms
302b2('dul ba): phul/ /shAkya'i rigs la bdag skyes na'ang / /bdag ni ma 'gags yin par shes/ /rol mo glu la mkhas gyur pas/ /pheg sgra phyad pas bslang ba na/ /rdzogs sangs ga las bsnyengs med pa/ /ston pa bdag gis mthong bar gyur/ /mthong nas
302b3('dul ba): bdag ni sems dad pas/ /khyim med par yang rab tu byung / /bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/ /bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/ /rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan zhing / /gzabs pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/ /sangs rgyas bstan
302b4('dul ba): pa mthar phyung nas/ /rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/ /bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/ /sngon gyi gnas ni shes gyur te/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams su/ /bdag gis lan bdun skye ba blangs/ /slar yang mi yi nang du ni/ mi yi dbang po lan
302b5('dul ba): bdun byas/ /de tshe 'dzam tshal dbang phyug gi/ /rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur to/ /'dir ni bdun dang der bdun te/ /bdag gis lan ni bcu bzhir 'khor/ /bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/ /gnas ni sngon du shes gyur te/ /las kyi 'bras bu de
302b6('dul ba): lta bu/ /bdag gis de tshe nyams su myong / /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /dga' ba dag gis rgyu bar byed/ /sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / /'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba dang / /'di lta bu dang gzhan gyur shes/ /'phags pa'i yan lag lnga ldan dga'/ /
302b7('dul ba): yan lag lnga pa'i ting 'dzin la/ /zhi ba phyogs gcig goms byas shing / /shin du sbyangs thob lam gyis ni/ /lha yi spyan ni rnam par sbyangs/ /ston pa 'jig rten bla med kyis/ /bdag gi kun rtog mkhyen nas kyang / /yid las byung ba'i sku yis ni/ /
302b8('dul ba): bdag drung rdzu 'phrul gyis byon nas/ /ston pa spros med la dgyes pas/ /spros pa dang ni bral ba bshad/ /bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/ /bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/ /rtag par pha rol gnon brtan zhing / /gzabs pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/ /
303a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bstan la mthar phyung nas/ /rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/ /'chi ba 'ang mngon par mi dga' zhing / /'tsho ba 'ang mngon par mi dga' ste/ /shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis/ /dus la so sor rtog par byed/ /yangs pa'i 'od ma'i grong
303a2('dul ba): khyer gyi/ /'od ma'i tshang tshing de'i drung du/ /bdag gi srog ni zad nas kyang / /zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsod snyoms byin pas ni/ /'bras bu thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa'i/ /ston pa bdag gis mnyes
303a3('dul ba): par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas bsod nams can/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan ma 'gags pas/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun
303a4('dul ba): 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ma 'gags pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po la
303a5('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nag po tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pos de'i tshe
303a6('dul ba): rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bu ram sbyor ba'i khang pa na/ /bu ram shing rnams 'tshir ba las/ /rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/ /nad pa gsor rung zhig 'ongs nas/ /bdag gis thub pa nub bdun du/ /bu ram til mar bsnyen bkur
303a7('dul ba): byas/ /skal ldan zhag bdun 'das pa dang / /de nas de ni mkha' la 'phags/ /de nas bran de nyer 'ongs nas/ /bdag la smras par gyur pa ni/ /yon gnas rab tu byung gyur pa/ /de lta bu ni song bar gyur/ /
303a8('dul ba): drang srong mkha' la song ngo zhes/ /bdag gis de las tshig thos nas/ /sems mgu ba dang yid bde bas/ /de yi tshe na dad pa byas/ /sems rab dang ba de dang ni/ /bu ram sbyin par btang ba des/ /bsod nams byas pas
303b1('dul ba): mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/ /
303b2('dul ba): mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag gi chos gos bsod snyoms dang / /yo byad dang ni gnas mal gyi/ /rnyed pa mang po skye bar gyur/ /bdag ni chos gos 'drub pa na/ /
303b3('dul ba): bu ram btung ba glud pa'i phyir/ /bdag la bu ram snod bzhi zhig /dgos so snyam du bsams pa dang / /rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ /de nas lha yis smras pa ni/ /ri dgas 'dzin bu nag po la/ /bu ram btung ba byin cig dang / /
303b4('dul ba): mi yi dbang po khyod kyis ni/ /bu ram btung ba don chen 'gyur/ /'tsho byad a mra'i tshal du ni/ /ri dgas bu la bu ram skyol/ /rgyal po'i mchog ni mthu chen po/ /gzugs can snying pos bdag la ni/ /snod chen bu ram gyis bkang ba/ /bzhi po
303b5('dul ba): dag ni bskur bar gyur/ /de nas des ni bu ram dag /ro dang ldan pa khyer 'ongs nas/ /stong ni nyis brgya lnga bcu yi/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshim par byas/ /ri dgas 'dzin bu dgra bcom pa/ /mngon shes drug ldan mthu chen po/ /
303b6('dul ba): ma dros pa yi mtsho chan du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan
303b7('dul ba): zin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas
303b8('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon lus 'phags mi thi la'i/ /bdag po rgyal por gyur pa na/ /dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'dug nas/ /skye bo rjes su bstan pa na/ /de nas
304a1('dul ba): drang srong dka' thub che/ /gzi brjid mchog 'jigs 'ongs gyur te/ /de ni nye bar 'ongs nas kyang / /bdag la 'di skad tshig smras so/ /sa bdag bdag ni rkun ma ste/ /bdag gis ma byin chab 'tshal gyis/ /rkun po'i
304a2('dul ba): chad pa ji lta bar/ /khyod kyis de bzhin bcad du gsol/ /drang srong chos kyi yon tan dga'/ /de la bdag gis der smras pa/ /khyod la chu ni gnang bar byas/ /khyod ni song la ci bder spyod/ /rgyal po bdag gi 'gyod pa ni/ /de ltas
304a3('dul ba): bsil ba'i rngo mi thog / bdag la chad pas gcod mdzod dang / /'gyod pa dag dang 'bral bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis de ni bskyed mos tshal/ /gzhir ni zhag drug spang ba byas/ /de ni zhag drug lon nas phyir/ /rang gi bsti gnas gnas su song / /
304a4('dul ba): zhe sdang med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sdig pa bdag gis byas pas kyang / /rab tu tsha dang thig nag tu/ /lo ni drug bcu rnams su btsos/ /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/ /ma yi mngal du
304a5('dul ba): lo drug ni/ /tshang bar yang ni 'dug par gyur/ /bdag ni zhe sdang med bzhin du/ /lus dang ngag gi las byas pa/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/ /
304a6('dul ba): dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sgra gcan zin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan
304a7('dul ba): gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang da rang gi
304a8('dul ba): las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la/ /bdag gis lan cig khrus byas te/ /dge slong dge 'dun khrus
304b1('dul ba): byas nas/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /dag cing dri ma med pa dang / /nyon mongs med cing zag bral shog /kha dog bzang po dag dang ni/ /gzugs
304b2('dul ba): bzang gyur ces smon lam btab/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ /lha rnams su ni skyes par gyur/ /bdag ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /mi dang lha ni rnams su gyur/ /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /longs spyod
304b3('dul ba): chen pos shin tu gnas/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni/ /shin tu dkar po bdag gis brtsigs/ /de nas byug pas thams cad ni/ /ser por gyur pa de ltar byugs/ /de nas mtshan rnams 'dod pa'i phyir/ /gser
304b4('dul ba): gyi mdog tu 'gyur ba dang / /gzugs bzang dbyibs ni legs 'gyur bar/ /smon lam du ni gdab pa byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /grong khyer bA rA Na sIr ni/ /ka shi'i rgyal po kri ki yi/ /bu pho 'bring por bdag skyes so/ /
304b5('dul ba): 'od srung mchod rten mthong nas ni/ /de nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ /mchod rten de la bdag gis ni/ /gdugs 'bring zhig ni gdags pa byas/ /khrus de dang ni bsro khang dang / /yung gi byug pas byug pa dang / /gdugs
304b6('dul ba): ni gdags pa byas pa yis/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs skyes nas/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa'i mched du gyur/ /
304b7('dul ba): bdag gi lus ni 'di la yang / /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yod pa/ /sum bcu lhag pa ma yin pa'i/ /sum bcu dman pa ma yin pa'o/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan
304b8('dul ba): 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas mdzes pa yi/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /nyes bsal zag pa zad nas ni/ /go 'phang dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /
305a1('dul ba): de ltar gnas brtan dga' bos ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /dga' bo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas dge slong gnas
305a2('dul ba): brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis kyang da rang gi
305a3('dul ba): las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ 'di ni bdag sngon tshong pa ni/ /nya pa zhes ni bya bar gyur/ /tshong pa'i lam du zhugs pa na/ /dbang du gyur
305a4('dul ba): cing zag med pa/ /nyon mongs med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /drang srong zhig ni 'gron par 'ongs/ /de yi bar du bdag gis ni/ /rtag par zas la 'gron du bos/ /gang du 'brang ni 'debs 'gyur ba/ /der ni gding ba dag kyang bshams/ /rkang pa'i
305a5('dul ba): chu dang til mar dang / /de yi mar me dag kyang bshams/ /ji srid lam yod de srid du/ /bdag gis de la bkur sti byas/ /tshong pa rnams kyis rim bzhin du/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / /dge slong gru drung nyer 'ongs nas/ /bdag gis de la
305a6('dul ba): smras pa ni/ /btsun pa rgya mtsho 'di la ni/ /nor gyi slad du bzhud dam ci/ /btsun pa bdag cag phongs pas na/ /'dod pa dag gi phyir yang ni/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu tshogs la/ /nyen can du ni 'jug par byed/ /bdag la dge slong des
305a7('dul ba): smras pa/ /bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /khyed cag gnyen kun lhan cig tu/ /nor cher bsod nams che bder gyur/ /de tshe de la bdag gis ni/ /rab dgas chos gos bzang po phul/ /mgo bos phyag ni byas nas yang / /de la bskor ba
305a8('dul ba): dag byas so/ /de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /des ni chos gos blangs nas ni/ /de dag thams cad lta bzhin du/ /de yi 'og tu mkha' la 'phags/ /cho 'phrul byed pa de mthong nas/ /de tshe bdag ni skyo gyur nas/ /bdag gis thal mo sbyar
305b1('dul ba): byas te/ /de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /'di yis chos ni gang dag thob/ /de dag bdag gis thob par shog /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing / /rab tu 'byung ba thob pa dang / /
305b2('dul ba): dge 'dun la yang rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /rnam 'phrul bkur sti byed par shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/ /mi yi 'thob pa thob nas kyang / /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /bdag ni nor chen phyug pa dang / /
305b3('dul ba): bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bskal pa tha ma 'di la ni/ /srid pa tha ma 'di la yang / /ku shi zhes bya'i gyad rnams kyi/ /gyad kyi bur ni bdag skyes te/ /blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang / /gzugs bzang
305b4('dul ba): spyod pa mdzes pa dang / /thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing / /phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin no/ /sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge ni/ /bla na med pa mnyes par byas/ /mthong nas bdag sems dad byas te/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /ma ga d+ha yi
305b5('dul ba): ri brgyud nas/ /'od ma'i tshal du gnas byas na/ /dge slong dge 'dun tho 'tsham pa'i/ /nyan thos dag cig der lhags te/ /gnas mal dag ni bskos na yang / /dge slong rnams la spyo byed de/ /rnam par 'tshe zhing smod pa dang / /yang dang
305b6('dul ba): yang du gshe bar byed/ /tshangs mtshungs spyod pa rnams mthong nas/ /bdag ni snying rje bar gyur te/ /bdag ni zag pa zad gyur kyang / /nyid kyis dge slong bsnyen bkur bya/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams nas ni/ /bstan pa 'di la
305b7('dul ba): brtson byas pas/ /dgra bcom bdag gis thob nas ni/ /mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar song nas ni/ /thub la mgo bos phyag byas te/ /thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /skyes bu dam pa la gsol pa/ /
305b8('dul ba): 'dod chags gti mug gis ma lags/ /byams sems gus dang bcas pa yis/ /thub pa bdag ni dge slong gi/ /rim gro bgyid par gnang bar mdzod/ /pha rol sems la mkhas pa yi/ /ston pas bdag gsol
306a1('dul ba): mkhyen nas ni/ /nyid kyis dge slong dge 'dun mdun/ /gnyug ma'i rim gro byed du bcug /byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ni/ /de bzhin ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /bdag gis rtag tu sems smad nas/ /dge slong dge 'dun rim
306a2('dul ba): gro byas/ /spyod pa la ni zhugs pa dang / /lam nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag /bdag gis mthong nas dga' ba dang / /so sor yid ni bde gyur nas/ /til mar rab 'bar lta bu yi/ /bdag gi sor lnga'i sgron ma yi/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par
306a3('dul ba): bstan byas nas/ /gnas mal dag ni 'cha' bar byed/ /dge slong gang dag bdag gi ni/ /cho 'phrul 'di ni lta 'dod na/ /nam ni sros par gyur pa dang / /mun khung bdag drung lhags nas ni/ /de rnams la ni ci rigs par/ /byams sems
306a4('dul ba): gus dang bcas pa yis/ /gnas mal dag ni 'cha' byed cing / /skye bo mang po skyo ba skyed/ /bdag gis bsams pa gang yin dang / /bdag gis smon lam gang btab pa/ /bdag gi bzang po de grub cing / /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag
306a5('dul ba): gis thob/ /de lta bur ni gyad bu nor/ /zag pa med cing dbang gyur pas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gyad bu nor gyi le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //
306a6('dul ba): de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye sde tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa nyes sdes kyang da rang gi las
306a7('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ /'das pa dag gi dus na bdag /rngon pa dag tu gyur pa na/ /nags chen nyams dga' byul ba dang / /ri dgas rnam pa sna tshogs
306a8('dul ba): mthong / /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams dang / /gzhu yi tshogs dag blangs nas ni/ /ri dgas mang po'i ri yi rdzong / /de yang der ni bdag gis brgyus/ /bdag gis ri dgas rnams mthong na/ /gdug pa'i sems ni nyer
306b1('dul ba): bzhag nas/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams kyis/ /ri dgas mang po rab tu bsnun/ /bdag gi lag na gzhu dang ni/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' srel bzhin/ /rang sangs rgyas shig ljon shing gi/ /drung na bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur/ /
306b2('dul ba): bdag gis dge sbyong de mthong nas/ /de tshe yid ni mi bder gyur/ /de nas thub pa gnod med pa'i/ /lus la mdas ni bsnun par gyur/ /de yi 'og tu dge slong de/ /mda' yi zug rngu'i sdug bsngal ldan/ /shing de nyid kyi drung du ni/ /
306b3('dul ba): len pa med par mya ngan 'das/ /rtsub pa'i las de byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni/ /de la lo ni stong phrag tu/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /de nas dmyal las shi 'phos nas/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas
306b4('dul ba): song nas ni/ /ri yi rdzong ni de nyid du/ /bdag ni ri dgas rnams su skyes/ /rtag tu 'jigs shing bag tsha zhing / /bkres shing skom pas nyen pas na/ /rid cing shin tu sdug bsngal bas/ /bdag ni de dang der rgyu'o/ /rdzong der rngon pa
306b5('dul ba): gdug pa ni/ /shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyis/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnon gyis/ /bdag gi lus la bsnun par gyur/ /bdag 'gyel de dag gis mthong nas/ /bdag ni gson zhing 'gul bzhin du/ /mtshon
306b6('dul ba): gyis yan lag rnams kyi sha / bcad nas de rnams khyer zhing 'dong / /bdag ni sa phyogs de nyid du/ /sha yi ched du bsad byas te/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /sdug bsngal mang po bsgrubs pa yin/ /ri bo
306b7('dul ba): de nyid ngos na ni/ /dka' thub ldan la mthu che zhing / /rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa'i/ /drang srong rab tu mang po mthong / /bdag gis drang srong de mthong nas/ /de nas byams pa'i sems bsgoms te/ /blo bzang
306b8('dul ba): byams dang ldan pa la/ /yang dang yang du blta byas so/ /dka' thub ldan pa de rnams la/ /bdag gis gus bcas mos dad byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/ /
307a1('dul ba): zas don gnyer ba'i slong ba ni/ /rang sangs rgyas shig mthong nas ni/ /gus pa yis ni rtag par de/ /bdag gis zas la spyan drangs so/ /btsun pa de tshim byas nas su/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /drang srong 'di
307a2('dul ba): lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing / /bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/ /'jigs shing skrag pa med pa yi/ /zag pa med la gnas par shog /dge ba'i las de byas
307a3('dul ba): pas na/ /lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/ /mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas kyang / /phyug cing nor ni mang bar gyur/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa/ /ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byas/ /bdag gis shAkya thub mthong nas/ /khyim
307a4('dul ba): med par ni rab tu byung / /dad pas rab tu byung nas kyang / /bstan la dga' bas gnas byas pas/ /bdag gis dgra bcom thob nas ni/ /mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag ni thams cad dbang gyur na 'ang / /
307a5('dul ba): phug gi nang du zhugs nas su/ /'chi ba nye bar gyur pa na/ /sbrul gdug shin du mi bzad pa/ /bdag gi lus la 'bab par gyur/ /btsun pa bdag gis nyes spyad pa/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las ni chud mi za bas na/ /de yi
307a6('dul ba): 'bras bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan nye sde yis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /nye sde'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas
307a7('dul ba): brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe
307a8('dul ba): dang ldan pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ dgon pa shin du 'jigs chen gyi/ /mu ge dag ni byung ba na/ /rang gi zas ni don gnyer ba/ /slong ba po ni lnga brgya yi/ /de rnams kun gyi dpon gyur cing / /de dag
307b1('dul ba): kun gyis gtsor bkur te/ /de rnams kun gyis bslangs pa yi/ /zas ni bdag la 'bul bar byed/ /de dag bzang ngam ngan pa'ang rung / /thob pa bdag la 'ged par byed/ /bdag gi tshig gis gnas pas na/ /de dag bdag la brnyas mi byed/ /mi zhig
307b2('dul ba): snum khur zhig khyer nas/ /tshong 'dus nang nas 'gro ba las/ /bdag gis de las mthus phrogs te/ /khyer nas de nas song ba dang / /de nas bdag gis brgyugs pa dang / /phyi bzhin du ni snyegs ma byung / /smyags bcad bros par gyur pa na/ /de dag
307b3('dul ba): gis ni gzung ma nus/ /'bab chu'i pha rol rgal nas ni/ /bdag ni phyogs gcig 'dug nas su/ /'ga' zhig 'ong bar 'gyur snyam nas/ /mtha' dag tu ni lta bar byed/ /snum la g.yos legs byas zin pa'i/ /snum khur bdag gis zos na ni/ /des na
307b4('dul ba): bdag ni lto 'grangs pas/ /nyin zhag gcig ni thub 'gyur snyam/ /de nas skal ldan rang sangs rgyas/ /yang srid skye ba zad gyur pa/ /rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa/ /drang srong 'jigs pa zhig 'ongs so/ /bdag gi sems la bsams pa ni/ /sdug bsngal bkren
307b5('dul ba): par gyur pa ni/ /sngon chad bsod nams ma byas pas/ /des bdag 'di ltar bkren par gyur/ /ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/ /snum khur gtsang ma 'di sbyin te/ /bdag ni ltogs par shi bla yi/ /'di lta bkren pa mi rung ngo / /de la bdag sems dad byas nas/ /yid
307b6('dul ba): mgu ba dang rangs pa yis/ /dge slong dam pa mchod 'os pa'i/ /yon gnas de la snum khur phul/ /skal ldan gyis ni de blangs nas/ /bdag nyid la ni snying brtse'i phyir/ /de nyid du ni longs spyad nas/ /de nas mkha' la 'phags par gyur/ /
307b7('dul ba): de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /bdag ni bkren par mi 'gyur zhing / /kha dog bzang po rnams dang ni/ /rigs btsun pa yang don du gnyer/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /khyod nyid kyis
307b8('dul ba): ni gang rtogs pa/ /de 'dra'i chos kyang shes par shog /dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /lha dang mi yi rgyal srid kyang / /
308a1('dul ba): bdag gis mang po nyams su myong / /las de yis ni lan 'ga' yang / /bdag ni ngan 'gror ma song ngo / /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/ /shAkya rnams kyi grong mchog tu/ /rigs btsun par ni bdag skyes
308a2('dul ba): so/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /shAkya seng ge 'di mnyes byas/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /nye du'i gnas su gshegs pa na/ /de tshe bdag ni nye du yi/ /mdun du bdar nas
308a3('dul ba): rab tu byung / /bdag gi smon pa gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gis yongs rdzogs te/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /rgyal po'i rgyud las rab byung ba/ /sangs rgyas nye du bzang ldan gyis/ /ma dros
308a4('dul ba): pa yi mtsho chan du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
308a5('dul ba): ldan pa mdzes bzang tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis de'i
308a6('dul ba): tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ skyob pa log par dad sel gyi/ /mchod rten zhig ni rtsig pa na/ /de tshe bdag ni khar len pa/ /gla mir gyur te de nas ni/ /bdag gis mchod rten rtsig pa la/ /yang dang yang du dpyad pa ni/ /
308a7('dul ba): mchod rten 'di ni che ches pas/ /nam zhig na ni mthar phyin 'gyur/ /mchod rten 'di ni 'phang dma' zhing / /chung ngu zhig tu byas gyur na/ /'god pa chung zhing nyon mongs med/ /myur du mthar yang phyin par
308a8('dul ba): 'gyur/ /las kyi rnam smin de dang ni/ /ngag gi nyes par spyad pa des/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas te/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes par gyur/ /dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /kha dog ngan cing bong chung la/ /
308b1('dul ba): bdag ni yongs kyis smad par gyur/ /'od srung gi ni gsung rab tshe/ /sngon ni khu byug phor gyur nas/ /bA rA Na sI'i lam gyi bar/ /tshal stug po yi nang na gnas/ /de na 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun byas la/ /
308b2('dul ba): bdag gis 'jam dbyangs skad phyung zhing / /nam mkha' las ni der bskor to/ /ji tsam yang dag sangs rgyas ni/ /bsod snyoms don phyir gshegs mthong na/ /'byung ba dang ni gshegs pa la/ /rtag tu yang ni bskor ba byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa
308b3('dul ba): ba de yis ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /
308b4('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis/ /'jam dbyangs rnams kyi mchog dang ni/ /mang du thos dang chos 'dzin dang / /dge ba'i spobs pa can du bstan/ /lha 'am yang na mi yang rung / /
308b5('dul ba): 'khor bzhi po dag bdag las ni/ /snyan cing 'jebs pa'i chos thos nas/ /thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /dge ba nyung ngu byas pa dang / /mi dge mang po byas pa yi/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras
308b6('dul ba): bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan mdzes bzang gis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /mdzes bzang gi le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// //
308b7('dul ba): sdom ni/ lam phran sprul khol ma 'gags dang / /nag po lnga pa sgra gcan dang / /dga' bo nor dang nye sde dang / /bzang ldan dang ni mdzes bzang ngo / /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas
308b8('dul ba): 'jog sbrang rtsi can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
309a1('dul ba): lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag ni sngon ni yangs pa yi/ spra chen spre'u dbang gyur pa na/ /lhung bzed mang po mthong nas ni/ /
309a2('dul ba): rgyal ba'i lhung bzed blangs pa las/ /dge slong rnams kyis bdag bkag nas/ /de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /'di ni lhung bzed mi gcog gis/ /dge slong rnams kyis ma dgag zhig /ston pa'i lhung bzed khyer nas ni/ /shing
309a3('dul ba): gi khar ni 'dzegs nas su/ /sbrang rtsis yongs su bkang nas kyang / /dal bus rim gyis babs nas ni/ /lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can thogs te/ /ston pa la ni phul ba las/ /ston pa srog chags bcas par ni/ /mkhyen
309a4('dul ba): te bdag las ma bzhes nas/ /bdag gis phyogs gcig song nas ni/ /de la srog chags yod mthong nas/ /srog chags med par gtsang byas te/ /ston pa la ni phul ba dang / /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /bdag
309a5('dul ba): las sbrang rtsi ma bzhes par/ /ma brtags thugs su chud nas ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas ma bzhes snyam/ /de nas lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can/ /de tshe bdag gis chus btab nas/ /sems ni mgu dang dga' ba yis/ /rdzogs
309a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas la phul ba las/ /de nas gang zag zla med pa/ /ston pa'i phyag 'jam gnyis kyis su/ /bdag la lhung bzed bzhes nas ni/ /de ni nyan thos rnams la gtad/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/ /
309a7('dul ba): de nas chos rgyal spyan snga nas/ /gar byed cing ni de nas song / /de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /mi nyid dag ni thob nas su/ /ston pa 'di la brten nas ni/ /byang chub dam pa 'di reg shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /mi yi srid pa thob nas ni/ /
309a8('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni dgra bcom dbang
309b1('dul ba): gyur cing / /mngon shes drug ldan rdzu 'phrul che/ /dge slong rnams kyis bdag la ni/ /gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can du shes/ /bsod nams byas pas grags ldan pa/ /bdag ni rtag tu bkur zhing mchod/ /dge slong dge 'dun yongs bskor nas/ /
309b2('dul ba): bdag ni rgyu zhing song ba na/ /de nas dgon pa'i lam du ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun skom gyur nas/ /de na sems la smon pa ni/ /de ring sbrang rtsi rnyed gyur cig /de nas mi ma yin rnams kyis/ /bdag smon shes te phyogs bzhi nas/ /sbrang rtsi khur
309b3('dul ba): gyis blangs nas ni/ /de dag tu ni 'bul bar byed/ /bdag gis sbrang rtsi ci dgos pa/ /bzang po dag las blangs nas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshim byas te/ /de nas lhag par legs par gyur/ /'das ma thag pa'i skye ba la/ /spre'u yi rgyal
309b4('dul ba): po de byas pas/ /log par ltung nas bdag 'phos nas/ /'chi med go 'phang reg gyur te/ /ji skad bdag gis smon pa yi/ /thams cad 'byor pa nyid du gyur/ /ston pa bkur sti byas pas 'dir/ /rang gi don ni yongs su rdzogs/ /btsun pa
309b5('dul ba): bdag gis dge ba gang / /bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang / /bde 'byung 'dod pa nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /
309b6('dul ba): rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ / bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams
309b7('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi
309b8('dul ba): rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bshes ldan grong du bdag gis sngon/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ /sangs rgyas rnam par
310a1('dul ba): gzigs pa ni/ /grong khyer dam par 'jug pa mthong / /thugs rje che ldan mthong nas ni/ /me tog sil mas gtor nas der/ /me tog rtsa bas yar brteg cing / /gyen du kha bltas khang bzangs gnas/ /de nas bdag ni rab dga' bas/ /
310a2('dul ba): thub pa'i zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar nas ni/ /de la bskor ba byas par gyur/ /bdag gis chos ni ma thos shing / /bdag ni skyabs su ma song bar/ /sems dad nyid cig byas nas ni/ /bde gshegs drung nas
310a3('dul ba): bdag song ngo / /mthu chen rnam par gzigs pa la/ /dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /ngan 'gro mngon par mi shes so/ /bdag ni lha lus rab dga' zhing / /lha yi 'dod pa yang dag 'byor/ /mi nyid
310a4('dul ba): rnyed pa thob nas kyang / /bdag ni nor chen phyug por gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /nor che longs spyod che ba yi/ /bram ze rnams kyi rigs su gyur/ /sgra nges sbyor dang shes gsal bcas/ /skyes bu chen po
310a5('dul ba): mtshan dang ni/ /tshig gi don bcas ston pa yis/ /gsang tshig rnams kyi pha rol phyin/ /bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni/ /tshal du gsang tshig brjod pa'i phyir/ /bram ze rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /bdag ni khyim nas byung ba las/ /bdag
310a6('dul ba): gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun bdar nas/ /dpa' bo chen po ma ga d+ha'i/ /grong mchog tu ni 'jug pa mthong / /bdag gis thugs rje ldan mthong nas/ /yid dga' bar ni gyur pa dang / /sngon gyi rgyu ni de dag gis/ /
310a7('dul ba): mtshan rnams la ni brtags pa las/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs rdzogs shing / /dpe byad rnams kyis mdzes pa yi/ /grags par ldan pa mthong bar gyur/ /mtshan dang ldan pa de mthong
310a8('dul ba): nas/ /mgo bo yis ni phyag byas te/ /phyogs gcig 'dug nas gus pas ni/ /'dren pa de la mngon bstod pa/ /ji ltar gsang tshigs la gda' ba/ /khyod la de bzhin de gda' bas/ /khyod sangs rgyas par the tshom med/ /
310b1('dul ba): 'jig rten gyi ni ston pa mchog /khyod ni tshangs pa brgya byin khyod/ /khyod las lhag pa ma mchis te/ /khyod ni nyi ma khyab 'jug lags/ /khyod ni 'jig rten bla na med/ /rgyal ba khyod 'dra 'ang ma mthong na/ /lhag pa lta zhig ga la zhig /lha dang
310b2('dul ba): bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /khyod ni rgyal ba bdud zil non/ /khyod ni mgon med rnams kyi gnas/ /rten med rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags/ /khyod kyi nyan thos nyid du mchis/ /khyod ni bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig /de nas gser gyi
310b3('dul ba): mchod sdong lta'i/ /phyag ni de yis brkyang mdzad de/ /rgyal ba'i phyag ni smad mdzad nas/ /bdag gi mgo la kun du byugs/ /yid ni rab tu dang byas pas/ /khyod kyis bsod nams mang po bskyed/ /sems ni rab tu dang rnams
310b4('dul ba): kyi/ /yon chung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/ /yon gnas bla na med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas la ni khyod kyis bsten/ /bram ze khye'u yis mchod sbyin byas/ /zhing rab la ni sa bon btab/ /ngan song gi ni lam bcad pas/ /
310b5('dul ba): khyod la ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med/ /bram ze khye'u yis bdud rtsi yis/ /sgo phye bar ni dogs med byos/ /khyod ni rab tu 'byung 'dod na/ /ral pa kun ni myur spongs te/ /nga yi spyan sngar rab byung la/ /bram ze
310b6('dul ba): tha ba med par gyis/ /bdag ni chos nyid la dga' nas/ /de na slob ma'i tshogs smra ba/ /khyod ni bram zer gyur zin na/ /ji ltar dge sbyong mgo reg 'gyur/ /dkar po'i rigs 'di spangs nas ni/ /nag po'i rigs 'di
